Reviews.Content: My whole family loves the ipad, I bought several because there is no way that is not in the hands of some my children or my wife's hands. we used other good tablets, but this is the best

Reviews.Title: It's so cool
Reviews.Author: Doctor Gail
Reviews.Content: I'm still learning what I can do with it  but I'm having fun. It's last years model, but was 150 bucks less so I was able to buy a network wireless printer for the difference. I'm very happy with the product and the seller.

Reviews.Title: This is my third iPad
Reviews.Author: Michelle Stone "litebkt"
Reviews.Content: If all computers worked as flawlessly as iPads, many more people would be computer literate. I gave one to my hubby for his birthday last year and for the first time in his life, he can do the things he wants like email, web browsing, and Facebook.  In all the years I've been using iPads, I've never had issues as I've had with Windows devices. I like the expanded memory in this version and it was the principle reason I purchased it over the other new features introduced since the iPad2.  I have my entire music collection loaded and I like that. It is the first time I've been able to carry it all with me on any mobile device. In fact, with the new product integration Apple has introduced, I purchased a MacAir. Now I have reliability of performance and convenience I've never before had in computing platforms. I use this iPad with a matching Logitech keyboard/cover and carry it in an iPad purse. Now I can edit my documents wherever I go. As a writer, I love it. FWIW, I've worked in the computing industry all my life and have experience with multiple operating systems and networking.

Reviews.Title: This thing is great and is great to hold
Reviews.Author: damien davis
Reviews.Content: I upgrade from my nexus 7 and I love this thing. I even love numbers such a great purchaseI was a little weary of going to a bigger tablet because I liked the way the 7 inch fits in the hand, but this tablet is so light, thin, and compact it feels good in the hand.And it's super face and the touch screen is so much more responsive than my nexus. So glad I got this

Reviews.Title: Love my iPad!
Reviews.Author: Allison "The Book Wheel"
Reviews.Content: I LOVE my iPad. I had the mini but it wasn't the right size for note taking in class so I upgraded to the iPad and it was the best decision I've made. I run a website and use the Feedly app, which loads faster than the desktop client I use sometimes, and I like that I can sync it up to my tv through the Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Surprised
Reviews.Author: Jesse M.L.
Reviews.Content: This is my first apple product ever.i usually had android products and I still like android. Tough there is something amazing about the iPad.i guess it is the simplicity, and the multifunction of the icons. Maybe my next phone will be a iPhone.. Anyways if you text iPads at the store you don't get the full experience. Plus the screen typing is easy no need for a physical keyboard.

Reviews.Title: Best purchase in years
Reviews.Author: Nicholas
Reviews.Content: I've slowly, by degrees, transitioned from a dedicated Dell user to an amateur Apple enthusiast. A year ago (roughly) I bought an iPhone and thought, from the start, that it was the best thing since sliced bread. Truly the iPhone is a great product, but after having owned and fiddled with the iPad for a spell, I must readjust my favoritism and focus it on this marvelous device.I'm not a gamer, nor am I a person who is likely to have a need or use for high-end software; my iPad is very humbly stocked with a few books and some google-related applications. For my needs, the device works like a dream. There's no returning to a laptop when it comes to sitting on the sofa and surfing the web -- the iPad is it!For all those who are uncertain as to whether this device is right for you, my two cents are to go for it. Most users have had an experience comparable to my own and we can't *all* be wrong.Cheers,-Nick

Reviews.Title: Husband loves this!
Reviews.Author: Joyce
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my husband and he loves everything about it . . this is a man that had never used a iPad only a laptop but he loves and uses this daily.  He is 66 and found it easy to use plus the clarity is the greatest. I also purchased the keyboard for him.

Reviews.Title: Does what I hoped it would
Reviews.Author: The Real Enigma "I'm a happy hater."
Reviews.Content: I am a hobby writer and a Chaplain Assistant for the US Army, as such I have to take notes, have access to AR's, FM's TC's and the like most of which are 200+ pages long.  When its time to hurry up and wait I can use this to fill in the time. The wireless is average and so is the G4 but that could just be because of the area I am in so take it with a grain of salt.  Ipad has a wide variety of Apps but not as many as I would like in the area of office like software, that is actually good quality. However if you do some searching you can find good apps that will do what you need them to do.  This acts as my kindle, laptop, notebook, scheduler, and email service all in one.It's not perfect, trying to transfer documents and such is a little cumbersom and requres you get the right apps, but with a little bit of tweaking you can customize it to your needs. Be awair that unlike your Ipod, or a USB drive this will not show up on your my Computer (if you have Windows) and you have to go through Itunes (not a real problem) to transfer most files.  As with anything do your homework first, as this may not suit what you are trying to do but if you decide that it does I must say I am very happy with this device and hope that Apple will keep up the good work in memory and spirit of it's founder.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Tayler
Reviews.Content: I am super happy with this product. The retina display is nice, the speed is very good. I will never go back to another tablet.

Reviews.Title: I love it. I love it. I love it.
Reviews.Author: Richard A. Raymond
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure that I would like any Apple product after hearing many of my friends complain about their experiences but after I bought my first iPhone earlier this year, purchasing the iPad was a no-brainer. It acts just like my iPhone, only with a bigger, brighter screen which makes playing my games so much better. I have already purchased 9 different games for it because it has so much space left after importing all of my music, pictures, and movies. Since I received it last week, I still haven't been able to put it down. I guess they fixed the map app since I haven't had any serious issues with using it. Overall, a very satisfying experience. Thanks!!!!

Reviews.Title: So convenient!
Reviews.Author: Janice
Reviews.Content: I am always on the go and spend a lot of time with my brother who is legally blind.  He has a lot of doctor appointments and I do a lot of waiting.  I take my iPad and fill the time reading, watching TV shows, or playing games.  Unless you have spent a lot of time in waiting rooms, you would not understand what a blessing this is.

Reviews.Title: Why I didn't buy it before?
Reviews.Author: Lemarfi
Reviews.Content: Great, beautiful, useful, very smart! I have to say that everybody should have a iPad, mainly if it is Retina's display! Very satisfied, I feel very modern since it is very quickly to run and to use to study and work! Great!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: Fast processor, better graphics and video than my 1st generation ipad. I highly recommend buying this version of the ipad.

Reviews.Title: Apple
Reviews.Author: Simeon Lamar Fowler
Reviews.Content: Most things I find about Apple they work the first time, No need to keep trying to download things, Much much faster connection. Battery life great may need to charge every three days. Don't like not being able to text message people without apple devices.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: James Snow
Reviews.Content: I have really enjoyed everything the iPad does all the functions great, got here on time and overall just a good machine

Reviews.Title: Like Brand New. Just as described.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great transaction. Fast shipping. Would recommend to a friend. The price is higher than a Kindle Fire because it is a higher quality product.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad with Retina Display - Black
Reviews.Author: Janit Satterfield
Reviews.Content: It was exactly what I wanted at a great price.  I also received it in just a few days in its original packaging.

Reviews.Title: iPad 4th Gen Pretty cool!
Reviews.Author: Joseph
Reviews.Content: I have just started using my first tablet. So far, I am really impressed with all the business, education, and entertainment applications available. The 9.7 retina display gives you a super clear view that is better than anything viewed on my laptop.

Reviews.Title: love my ipad
Reviews.Author: Patricia Wellman
Reviews.Content: This thing does so much more than i ever dreamed it would .  I am just learning to use it and I know it does so much more than I can even realize.  I am glad  I got it

Reviews.Title: Got here before it was promised
Reviews.Author: T. Cook
Reviews.Content: This was a last minute Christmas present.  Ordered it with the hopes of it getting here on time and it did!  Was and still am pleased.  I like the fact that no matter where you purchase your apple products the apple store, which is close to our house, treats it as if you purchased it from them.  Even though I am an avid driod fan, my kids like the apple products because all their freinds have apple products, I would definitely continue to buy apple products for the customer service.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Sunny
Reviews.Content: We love our new IPad! The graphics are truly amazing. I debated about how many GB we needed in our new IPad. After much debate 32GB was perfect for me know. However, I ultimately decided on the 64 GB knowing that if I invest this kind of money in electronics I am going to keep it at least a couple years. If my GB needs change in the futures I don't want to buy a new IPad. This item is pricey but worth it!

Reviews.Title: Very user friendly
Reviews.Author: deb
Reviews.Content: It is as easy to use. they were right that you could use it right out of the box. Great

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: FRANZ CAPRARO
Reviews.Content: Very clear imaging, excellent speed, sleek lines, very reliable. It's really more than an i Phone. Operations are mostly intuitive.

Reviews.Title: I just love it !!!
Reviews.Author: Lori D.
Reviews.Content: It was very easy to set up and use. It is great to be all relaxed on the sofa and send emails or Skype....

Reviews.Title: Microsoft user
Reviews.Author: Bruce P. Coleman
Reviews.Content: You convinced me..I bit the Apple...........It's great........... Still learning!....... I need to find easier instructions and software to print to my wifi printer.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Seek4good
Reviews.Content: GOOD Battery and no problem connecting, nothing negative about it. Been playing with since I got it. Still hadn't explored all it features yet..

Reviews.Title: El mejor...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Sin duda es la mejor tablet hecha hasta el momento. Posee todo lo que uno necesita y mucho más. Nunca de la de sorprenderte lo que hace y puede hacer

Reviews.Title: It is not so bad !
Reviews.Author: gaoyouya
Reviews.Content: I like it! !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!I can do a lot of things with it , but better if there will be more apps

Reviews.Title: iPad 4 or iPad 3s either way It's a great gadget
Reviews.Author: Mr AMZ
Reviews.Content: Got it from Sams Club for $494+tax.  The online prices were going at around $560.Never thought i would buy electronic gadgets from Sams Club but it was a good decision.Super fast, very clean, sharp display.

Reviews.Title: Great display and smooth scrolling hardware.  HORRIBLE i-Tunes.  5 yr olds must be writing their code.
Reviews.Author: John Henry "Teach"
Reviews.Content: Worst user interface ever on i-Tunes.  Have purchased 3d party code to do file transfers to/from it...WITHOUT i-Tunes.I'd return it on principle, but my wife loves it (She doesn't have to maintain the product).  It's nice, but we no longer use i-Tunes for anything.  Even their 'support' is difficult to get to.Apple, your cult following will diminish if i-Tunes is the best you've got.If i-Tunes were NOT the supporting software this product would get 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Great but still the Apples Windows complexity
Reviews.Author: Miguel A. Torres Roa "Miguel Torres"
Reviews.Content: Definetly i am a Mac user, i own a iMac 27', Macbook Pro, couple of iPods, an iPhone and my recent purchase... the iPad Retina.Is Great, fast, easy to use as any other iDevice, sadly some apple developers seems to be that they have worked in windows, for GODs SAKE!!!, whats the deal between sharing pictures with to different iDevices, it suppose to be easy to use, versatile and compatible with apple... so??? why everything has to pass through the annoying iTunes and the same disturbing message "This device is linked with another computer, syncing pictures from a different computer will erase them all"Apple managers, directors, technology and marketing guys... please keep it simple! (Plug and add, erase, let us do whatever we want to do with our images), if i hadn't have that many iDevices i would it change to Samsung or the Kindle Fire

Reviews.Title: Before this, I never met an Apple I really liked....
Reviews.Author: A B Cee
Reviews.Content: I'm a PC dood...but this thing is great. It'll probably replace my laptop and half of my PC usage, too. Now if it just contained a cell phone, a wet bar and a terlit..........but there'll probably be apps for those soon, huh? After that, I want a Holodeck staffed with two brunettes, a blonde, and one of those green-haired empaths.

Reviews.Title: awesome!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Eulalio Guevara
Reviews.Content: thes best birthday giift ever! is simply awesome, never had an ipad but now i have my own and i am very happy

Reviews.Title: Its an IPAD 4
Reviews.Author: R. Miller "ipe man"
Reviews.Content: What else can you say its the best tablet out there.  It works as expected.  Buying on-line is the way to go, simple and convenient.

Reviews.Title: Digital Christmas
Reviews.Author: justin byers
Reviews.Content: You got to have one!  The only downside to this product is the weight.  This is definitely a two- handed item.

Reviews.Title: I love my IPad
Reviews.Author: carol akers
Reviews.Content: I am so happy I bought this "Christmas" present for myself.  This is all new to me so I am slowly learning all the things I can do on my IPad.  I am technologically challenged, but I find using the IPad is easier than I expected.  I have nothing to compare this to as I have always had a desktop computer and know very little about all the technology out there.  All I can say is that I like it and I'm happy.

Reviews.Title: superb tablet!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "milanka13"
Reviews.Content: things I like : The retina retina display is in a class of it's own. The "touch" is very responsive.  things I don't like : the screen is easily breakable( as with most Apple products).It's far to big and heavy

Reviews.Title: Father's Day gift
Reviews.Author: Paulette Wallette
Reviews.Content: I gave my husband his Father's Day gift early. He loves it! I do too, now since he isn't on mine anymore! Gift gift!!!

Reviews.Title: Easy to use, and worth the price
Reviews.Author: Kent Huey
Reviews.Content: I really like this product. I was debating between the iPad with Retina display, and the Kindle Fire. I tested both, before purchasing the Apple product.  I found the Kindle Fire very difficult to use and navigate through.  While the iPad is VER Y user friendly. It has very easily downloadable Apps. Very easy to navigate from one App to the other. It has very sharp resolution.  In fact, I really could not discern any really noticeable difference in resolution between the iPad and the Kindle Fire. I am sure that professionals,with an "eye to detail", might possibly notice a difference, but for "every day joes", like me, the iPad is perfectly fine.  Price wise, I got a good deal on the iPad I purchased.  I was only going to purchase a 32GB, but, as I was researching and debating, I just happened to find the 126GB for about the same price as the 32GB.  So, don't be impatient, wait, search, and let Amazon get you a really good product at the best price.

Reviews.Title: Bought it for my wife.
Reviews.Author: Dexter S. Kekua
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my wife as a present to replace her gen 1 iPad.  She loved the old one and really loves the new one and its display.  Keeps peace in the family - she is a devoted Apple user - iPhone, iPad iPod - I am an android fan with Galaxy S4, Tab 10.1 Pro - so at least I won't have to share my phone and tab with my wife (superior screen).  The reason for the 5 stars is it is exactly what my wife wanted - no dissappointments

Reviews.Title: Ben
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: Well, most of time I hear that nothing changes in iPads and IPhones although android devices pop up in thousand models and price. I have both Android and Apple and I already replaced android twice but IPad and IPhone are still the first ones. And the reason for that is that Apple do not aim to have three hundred models but to perfect the only one they have in the way that you are not actually pushed to be replacing gear all the time. I make the same understanding for PC and Mac as I still have my very first one and PC I need to replace or upgrade hw every time a new windows is out. Cheers

Reviews.Title: clear screen
Reviews.Author: karl darn
Reviews.Content: the screen on this ipad looks incredible I cant believe how clear the screen is Its just not human. I have never seen anything like this before.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: N. Roskamp
Reviews.Content: just as advertised!!! My family loves this and i would not go smaller than the 32 gig if you want it to store movies and game apps

Reviews.Title: This is great
Reviews.Author: Bobby J. Price
Reviews.Content: I got my dad an iPad because I use mine to preach with, and I knwe that if he would use it that he would fall in love with it. I am on my second iPad and this is his first one. Yes so far he loves it but still has not used it to preach with, but will be doing this soon. It was great the iPad will do anything a computer will do, and so much more.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: PEGGY
Reviews.Content: I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a new or upgrade iPad. I think this Apple is the very best for the money and great price from Amazon!

Reviews.Title: I love my Ipad!
Reviews.Author: Londa Love
Reviews.Content: I received this earlier then expected.  It arrived in perfect condition and I have had no problems with it.  I do wish I would have waited a few weeks...then I could have purchased the iPad Air instead but I am still very happy with this purchase.  First thing I did was purchase a protective cover for it to keep it looking new for years to come.  Excellent customer service!

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad
Reviews.Author: Carole Thoutsis
Reviews.Content: Love this product so easy to setup.  Love how thin it is. Makes it easy to carry everywhere. Love apple products.

Reviews.Title: awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Love this Ipad.  Have a Galaxy tab 2 and it doesn't even compare with this ipad.  The display is so much better and the format is easier to use.  Highly recommend!!!

Reviews.Title: Love it, love it, love it!
Reviews.Author: Corine Tesch
Reviews.Content: When I am able to steal it back from my kids I am enjoying it.  I get great use out of it especially when I am relaxing in bed enjoying a Saturday afternoon.

Reviews.Title: Nice Buy!
Reviews.Author: Louis S. Morello
Reviews.Content: This outstanding iPad is a gift for my 84 year old father who just loves it.  Easy to use and he can take it from room to room to use it in his own comfort.  I recommend getting the iPad for Seniors or Dummies book to go along with it because it will help you tremendously.

Reviews.Title: IPad vs Samsung Galaxy
Reviews.Author: norma wood
Reviews.Content: I ordered Samsung Galaxy Tab.  Could not download movies from Amazon because unit needed flash player and flash player no longer on mobile devices.  Spent 2 weeks trying to get Google Play Store perk - never did get it. Assume support would be same.... So returned it to amazon & got Apple iPad.  I absolutely love it.  Have downloaded movies. & books.  Was so surprised & pleased with ease of learning a new system - I'd never operated an Apple. I can even print pictures from iPad.  A really amazing device.  I chatted with support re how to set up groups in contacts.  Patrick at Apple was fantastic.  Gave the link for group instructions which I printed right from the iPad.  It was a great experience with support. I HIGHLY recommend iPad.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad
Reviews.Author: Mary Mistretta
Reviews.Content: Very pleasedvwith its functionality.This was a gift for my twin brother who is mentakky handicapped. I was able to download appropriate games for him to play. Also teaching him to use facetime. He loves the iPad.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Anna Carter
Reviews.Content: It arrived really fast, even before the expected arrival date.  The only problem I had is they would not ship to Alaska.  It was a gift for my daughter and she lives in Alaska.  We had to mail it there after it came here.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: kay crofoot
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this IPad! Bought my first one in October and this one for my sister's retirement!! She loves hers as well. Your service is outstanding!!! Awesome!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Upgrade from iPad 2!
Reviews.Author: Hector F.
Reviews.Content: Sold my iPad 2 back to Amazon, and was debating between this iPad (64GB) 4th Gen or the new iPad Air. From what I seen on reviews they are basically the same except for size and weight difference. While this iPad is a little on the heavy side, it is definitely a lot faster than my previous iPad 2 and the retina display is awesome! Not too mention I kept the same cases from iPad 2.

Reviews.Title: My only regeat is not buy one years ago.
Reviews.Author: Al
Reviews.Content: Great! First apple product I've own, the voice command is perfect for us visually gifted folk. My only regeat is not buy one years ago.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Corey Davis
Reviews.Content: Excellent, practically looks brand new. Haven't had any problems with it so far. No scratches on the screen or on the back of the IPad. Love it.

Reviews.Title: Very easy
Reviews.Author: Stacie L. Helsing "stacielc"
Reviews.Content: Significant speed increase over iPad 2.  Significant resolution improvement.  Has excellent build feel and old cases work perfectly on it :-)

Reviews.Title: Recommend highly
Reviews.Author: Judy Cooley
Reviews.Content: This was the best purchase I have made. I love love love it. The price was absolutely perfect, I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: So far I like it. Still learning to use it right now.
Reviews.Author: William C Bell
Reviews.Content: So far I like it. I am still learning to use it right now. I'm 73 and this is the first ipad I have ever owned. I don't even have an iphone.

Reviews.Title: Fun
Reviews.Author: judie jones
Reviews.Content: Bought it for travel, still learning how to use it.  Don't like doing Facebook or gmail on it as well as my desk top, but have a vacation in May and will be forced to use it.  Takes great pictures and vidoes. I am not an electronic fan and I bought it because my son and law said I needed it not a cheap travel tablet. So far so good,

Reviews.Title: Finally...
Reviews.Author: slapshot
Reviews.Content: I have been wanting a tablet for awhile but must admit that cost was a huge issue in my decision to put off buying one. Need for a tablet finally caught up to cost and I started looking at several different brands. Who doesn't know about the iPad so I started looking at what I wanted/needed out of a tablet and what the other brands had to offer. After some time searching I was back to the iPad but was not happy at the cost of an "Air" and the amount of memory I got for the price. Bothered me enough that I almost  was going to buy another brand (didn't want to but was lower price claiming to be equal to iPad Air - though reviews of both said the iPad was better) when my friend mentioned that I should be able to get more memory by buying the last model prior to the present model. Thought had not crossed my mind. I did just that and got 2X the memory of an new iPad Air for $60 less.I love my iPad !!!!

Reviews.Title: Happy for it
Reviews.Author: Andre
Reviews.Content: Relly happy for the decision I made. Price for the value really good.. You could almost say ipad air inside an ipad 2 :)

Reviews.Title: iPad 4
Reviews.Author: Dana Butcher
Reviews.Content: Works wonderfully and the clarity of the image makes Skyping with friends and family a joy!  I would recommend this to anyone

Reviews.Title: I should had bought this one when it 1st came out. But I,m glad I finally got one.
Reviews.Author: SOUTHEASTMANIA
Reviews.Content: Have a lot of tablets. And this is one of my favorites  Apple Meeks great products and this is by far it's best !

Reviews.Title: A real problem solver
Reviews.Author: w earp
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a laptop (PC) user that I had to keep assisting with various web and application issues.  For general web surfing, gaming, email browsing, this really fit the bill and made life much easier for me.

Reviews.Title: Happy happy happy
Reviews.Author: mv "mcustomer"
Reviews.Content: We bought this for Grandma see love this she has a kindle, We never thought we would keep that out of her hands. Well she's keeping the Kindle but the I-pad is so beautiful to look at and very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Rosalia
Reviews.Content: I chose  the rate because of the quality of the product. It has got a nice design  and good graphics.  I'd recomend it

Reviews.Title: Got it, Love it!
Reviews.Author: Heather Brown
Reviews.Content: Got this for my daughter, and she lugs it around everywhere she goes, and likes to buy cute cases and dust plugs for it.  It seems a little mystifying to operate to me, compared to the Kindle Fire, which I use, but she does love it.

Reviews.Title: i pad
Reviews.Author: naresh
Reviews.Content: i have bought is i pad and it was amazing, but i have returned this product back because i placed wrong order instead of 4g i ordered a normal one, but the supplier was good and they have returned me back all my money. thanks once again to amazon.

Reviews.Title: Timing
Reviews.Author: Maryan
Reviews.Content: The ipad wasn't quite the way i expected, it seemed to be missing some memory space. I really got tired of waiting i shipped very late and arrived late which i really disliked, however the ipad was brand new as state and not damaged.

Reviews.Title: Awesome apple
Reviews.Author: wcar35
Reviews.Content: Apple makes a great product we have several ipads and they are the future for sure. The apps are great and everything is easy to access. We started as laptop fans but it now never gets used. The ipad is just simple, fast, and easy operation. Highly recomend ipad ....

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad
Reviews.Author: Carol Zappe
Reviews.Content: Love it!  It was a Christmas gift from my husband.  I really wanted the iPad Air but at least a hundred more, so this is fine for me.  I have a kindle fire but mostly use that for reading.  I downloaded the kindle app so if one is charging, I can read from the other.  I also prefer going on line with the iPad, it's larger and faster.

Reviews.Title: apple ipad
Reviews.Author: david ginder
Reviews.Content: although is was "used" it arrived in "new" condition. My wife and I are older than a lot of your users and were at first intimidated by it, but gradually we learned a lot about it and continue to be amazed by the various features that we learn about each time we use it.

Reviews.Title: Purchased this reconditioned iPad but not sure if it's an actually previously used.
Reviews.Author: DanyoLaker
Reviews.Content: I had a iPad 1 and needed to upgrade because many of the current apps are being written for IOS 7. I expected an iPad having minor scratches or slight indications of wear, especially on the back metal case. The iPad arrived in a fully packaged retail package and I'm hard pressed to find any wear. After using several months, still very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Top rating and pricing
Reviews.Author: Vicky Deckard
Reviews.Content: Great product and great price.  Just wish it had instructions with it for those of us that are not familiar with all of the new technology.

Reviews.Title: Like New Condition!
Reviews.Author: greg r strauss
Reviews.Content: I was anxious to see what shape the ipad was going to be in when it arrived.  However, once I opened the package, it was like I had bought new - with a big savings!  Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad with Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Raymond D. Engstrand
Reviews.Content: I bought it as a gift. The model was explicitly specified by the recipient. He is happy with it. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product
Reviews.Author: Sallie Hagerman
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter who will use it as she starts her student teaching in January. I feel we received a great product for the price.

Reviews.Title: Like
Reviews.Author: DA
Reviews.Content: Ordered for my wife to sync with her phone. She is very pleased with the the product and sharing capabilities with apple products.

Reviews.Title: excellent choice!
Reviews.Author: Indirah Burke
Reviews.Content: I received this item on time and in excellent condition... It works perfectly and was the best gift for my mom on her birthday....She loves it!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Mel
Reviews.Content: It is great just freeze from time to time. I got this for my boyfriend as a gift. Great sell brandnew

Reviews.Title: Really great iPad, holds all my MP4 videos
Reviews.Author: Andrew Zimmer
Reviews.Content: This is a really great iPad.  I got it to replace my iPad original, the changes are huge.  Normal to Retina display and 64GB to 128GB.  I have a collection of iTunes movies, this hold's em!

Reviews.Title: Excellent as ordered
Reviews.Author: Christ Presbyterian Church
Reviews.Content: Excellent.  Everything works well.  My first ipad.  I have had various I phones.  Nothing here to complain about.  Its as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Kenneth
Reviews.Content: Pretty pricey, but it's such a nice device to have around. I do my photography on it, watch movies, play games and more. Hopefully it'll last for years to come.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Display!
Reviews.Author: Janice Thomas
Reviews.Content: The picture is very vibrant and we can upload as many movies as we want. Great for long road trips!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Tablet for the Mac User
Reviews.Author: stuffintn
Reviews.Content: works as expected as an Apple product, works well, great display crisp . . . . . . . .

Reviews.Title: Why did I wait so long to become an Apple advocate?
Reviews.Author: S. Kling "SkyKing & Queenie"
Reviews.Content: I love our iPad... For the digitally challenged it is so easy to use.... And for the more knowledgeable it's an enormous improvement over all versions of previous items ...

Reviews.Title: Amazing tablet computer!
Reviews.Author: Ronald D. Sanders DDS
Reviews.Content: I've tried several computers and tablets and all had problems and returned them. Was ready to give up and my neighbor had an apple ipad2. Went and ordered one with new retina screen. Absolutely a light year ahead of anything else out there.  Is the Rolex of tablets!  Windows 8 is probably the worst software ever devised.  The apple system os7 is the beginning of all future computers.  hooray!,,,,

Reviews.Title: Worth the money.
Reviews.Author: Jerome C. Blair
Reviews.Content: This one is the real deal. Good for everything. Amazing screen. Youtube videos come alive and surfing the internet is easier than ever.....

Reviews.Title: A little piece of heaven in tablet form.
Reviews.Author: Thomas J. Madigan "Tommi2toes"
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, i'am 66 years old and just love using the I-pad. The pictures you can take with it are super great. Very easy to type, no need for external key board.

Reviews.Title: I bought the best and am glad
Reviews.Author: Carolyn B. Rzewski
Reviews.Content: It does everything ne I wanted it to do. It was easy to set up and download the apps. I really like Siri which works well.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: seacaptain
Reviews.Content: Pros: Excellent battery life and incredible screen. Great sound quality.Cons: could benefit with a mini-usb port and a larger hard drive

Reviews.Title: iPad is great, charger was defective
Reviews.Author: J. B. Fiedler
Reviews.Content: iPad was great but the end of the cable that fit into the iPad to charge it had literally been crushed. There was nothing to fit into the iPad for charging. I had to go out and buy a new cable. And,  yes the box was sealed and wrapped with the ruined cable in it.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: MARTIN
Reviews.Content: This product was a great deal of satisfaction to me. The tools it has is very useful as for work as for entairtainment as well.

Reviews.Title: Crisp, beautiful Retina display
Reviews.Author: D. Hongo
Reviews.Content: Lightweight, intuitive, and well designed.  The Retina display is stunning.  You'll want a protective case and some screen protectors to keep your iPad looking fresh.

Reviews.Title: Works well but wireless reception is more than pitiful
Reviews.Author: Chirper "Chirper1962"
Reviews.Content: I have an iPhone4, Macbook Pro, and the latest iPad. The MacBook Pro has a pretty darned good wireless card. The iPhone 4 and the iPad are pretty ridiculous, and very disappointing. I would not have bought the iPad if I had known it was so poor. If they can't do any better, I think they will lose market share to competitors. Love my Apple devices, but you gotta be able to pick up a wireless signal!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Russell H. Fleming "russellf"
Reviews.Content: I continue to be amazed. I did have an ASUS Transformer Prime TF201. Apple is clearly a better tablet. It is so smooth and well designed. I now plan to purchase my next phone from Apple.

Reviews.Title: Bought for husband
Reviews.Author: Forgiven "Pat"
Reviews.Content: He loves new gadgets and he was very surprised by this gift.  He is learning new things and so far hasn't found anything he doesn't like.

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Peter B. Jones "peterbj7"
Reviews.Content: Superb hardware, my only gripe is the "OK" mono speaker.  iOS is a constant irritant to me, totally Apple, they dictate to the user what they can and can't do or view on the machine.  Luckily 2rd party suppliers have produced software to compensate, and with that software iOS becomes usable.  I eagerly await someone producing an OS for this device that really exploits its capabilities.

Reviews.Title: Best purchase ever
Reviews.Author: stephen p brazzale
Reviews.Content: Can't say enough about my new I pad did not realize what I could do with it , I find myself using all the time problem is I can't put it down getting some grief from my wife but I will deal with it

Reviews.Title: New ipad
Reviews.Author: lala "lala"
Reviews.Content: I love my new iPad! Never owned one before and was skeptical in buying one. There doesn't seem to be a lot of information out there on what exactly you can do with an iPad, but I decided to buy it anyway and I am not disappointed. There are many wonderful free apps available and am very happy about that. So far so good am happy with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: liv "photofan"
Reviews.Content: I am using my iPad every day and hardly ever have had any problem with it. The only drawbacks I see is that it doesn't support software like the Flash player so there are things I can't do with it, and the fact that it doesn't have any USB port or memory card slots (I like to upload my photos and some files).I still need my computer for certain things, so it does not substitute a computer. But it is easy to take with me, for traveling it is great, and it does most of the things I need.

Reviews.Title: Incredible Tablet - review from an Apple Hater
Reviews.Author: David Kalish
Reviews.Content: Ok, here's the deal, I'm not a big fan of Apple.  I think that they use proprietary features and lock out very helpful items (like expansion cards and user-changeable batteries).  In fact, the biggest reason that Apple Fanboys tout their products is that they are user-friendly - and I find that ridiculous - iTunes is one of the WORST software interfaces I've ever seen - it's incredibly difficult to get it to do what you want.  And I've never been a fan of the iDevices either.Until today.  My incredibly generous girlfriend got me an iPad for my Birthday, and I am truly blown away by its ease of use (for the most part - some settings are really buried, or in non-intuitive locations), its tight form factor, its unbelievable battery life, and it's unparalleled apps and games.After only a few weeks, I find that it is my go to device for checking email, social media, gaming, and gathering information.  Even writing documents is easy because of Siri and it's impressive voice recognition.I still wish it had an SD card or expansion slot, but I really can't complain too much.  It really is an incredible device.

Reviews.Title: Palpably faster than iPad 3
Reviews.Author: MasonStorm
Reviews.Content: I see that many excellent reviews about this iPad have already been entered, so I just want to point out the one thing that is most salient to me.  I've owned each of the iPads (1, 2, 3, & mini) and just received this one.  It is very obviously faster than iPad 3!  I cannot believe the number of "professional" reviewers on tech sites stating that they didn't really notice any difference.I was enraptured when I first obtained iPad 3, and felt at the time that the retina display ticked off my last "needs" box as far as tablet computing.  But as I lived with it, it became annoying waiting on its A5X to scroll in a dense webpage ----- daily so.  And the internet browsing experience is the real reason to consider upgrading to the 4 from the 3; it really is that much better.  To use one of my favorite iDevice information websites as an example, go to www.imore.com on the iPad 3, and observe the staccato, stop-and-go browsing experience as you navigate down the page.  Now, do the same on the iPad 4; it's smooth as silk.I'll still be looking for the retina iPad mini when it arrives (looks like 2014 at this rate), but other than the slight heaviness of this iPad 4, I'm completely satisfied.  Noting the never-ending march to smaller-thinner-and-lighter-yet-longer-battery-life, it's difficult to see what Apple can do to improve upon this one.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: banda
Reviews.Content: I love this tablet! I chose to purchase the wifi iPad as I use it primarily from home and was not too thrilled with paying AT&T; even more money :). It has worked out perfectly, as most places have free wifi anyway. I also purchased an air printer for my iPad so I rarely need may lap top. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Norma H. Johnston
Reviews.Content: I had been wanting an iPad since it is smaller than a laptop and easier to take everywhere. I still use my laptop the most but once I get used to the iPad that will probably change. I do wish there had been an owners manual with it (paper version) and I'm sure there are a lot of things I could be doing with it that I don't know how. I will learn in time though.

Reviews.Title: iPad 4 replacing Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Vera Cousins
Reviews.Content: I am still in the learning curve but I think I will love it. The Kindle Fire had been adequate until I lost Wi-Fi access at a place where I spend a lot of time. I needed to be able to buy my own data time, which this iPad does. I have had some trouble finding some apps I want in the App store, even though I know they exist (my friend has them)..

Reviews.Title: The Ipad is awesome!
Reviews.Author: Joshua
Reviews.Content: Everyone should have an Ipad.  The graphics are awesome.  It's a little expensive but it is a very cool gadget.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad
Reviews.Author: Tonya Bigelow
Reviews.Content: I have two Kindles and didn't know for sure if I would use the iPad, but oh was I wrong!  I love it more and moreas we get to know one another!!  It has been easy to use, just as the Kindle was.  Things are much better andbetter for my eyes and that is a very good thing!  At first it kept slipping out of my hands and then I got smart andput it in the case that I got with the bundle and it is wonderful to use.  I love it and know as I get to know moreabout it, I will only love it more!

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Christopher Pipe
Reviews.Content: Overall, very pleased to own the item. Drawbacks: a little heavier than I was expecting. The battery takes a long time to recharge.Hence, 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: Ipad still feels best of the tablets
Reviews.Author: M. Green
Reviews.Content: It's surprisingly productive, not just a toy as some have said. Next time I would probably get the version with cell service not just wifi.  There are times, when traveling where it would be better to have all the time Internet connectivity and not have to hunt around for a wifi hotspot. Or definitely purchase mobile hotspot service if you get this model. This model doesn't have built in GPS like cellular model. That means if you plan on using this for GPS on the go, then you must purchase a separate gps to plug in (80-90$) and also pay for mobile wifi. So if you plan to use gps function, might be more cost effective to pay a little more up front for cellular version to save in added cost and inconvenience of hooking up this model for GPS use.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Daniel Dziubczynski
Reviews.Content: Had it for over a month and so far it exceeds expectations.  The speed is great, wifi connection good, and the retina display is jaw-droppingly beautiful.  Wish the battery lasted longer but charging it is no problem.  Other thing is my Brother printer isn't a compatible "airprinter", which is a downer, but not a huge deal as I don't need to print directly much.  Web browsing is fun, iMessage replaces texting from my cell phone (saving me $$), and streaming videos is a joy.  This is my first tablet and I couldn't be happier.  Oh yeah, I got the 16gb and it fills up fast.. Do yourself a big favor and get at least 32gb, I wish I did.

Reviews.Title: Best iPad Yet!
Reviews.Author: John Ranelletti
Reviews.Content: Excellent tablet with a retina display screen! The larger memory and faster speed are worth the upgrade. Very highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Apple the Best of the Best.
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Piedra
Reviews.Content: This iPad, its so wonderful, powerful and amazing. everything is great, the display, the app store, its really strong, and so useful. i love it.

Reviews.Title: Nice improvement from the iPad 2
Reviews.Author: unicorn "ljwachter"
Reviews.Content: I just bought the iPad 4 to replace the iPad 2 since my kids were using the 2 so much and I was tired of hounding them for it.  I'm very happy with the upgrades.  Like with my old iPad I'm basically using it to surf the net, watch streaming videos/podcasts, and read books.  I don't take pictures with it or store music.  I'm also not a gamer - so I can't comment that much on the retina display - but I will say the colors are brighter and I find it easier to read books.  The big difference that I notice is in the processor.  Even with my crappy internet connection I notice a huge improvement in the speed with opening apps and streaming videos.  Battery life is longer than the iPad 2. However, because the battery is bigger on this device it takes a lot longer to charge.  I like to kill the batteries on all my electronic devices before I charge them and from a dead battery to 100% charge on this iPad it took over 8 hours to fully charge.  I wasn't using it when it was charging.  In fact, I read on a couple of review sites that this iPad will continue to charge up to 2 hours after it says it's fully charged.  My advice is to allow yourself extra time and charge it overnight if you can.All in all I'm very happy with it.  Since I carry it with me everywhere I bought the OtterBox Defender Series Case with Screen Protector and Stand for the New iPad (4th Generation), iPad 2 and 3 - Pink Alpenglow for extra protection.  It does add some weight to this tablet but I like the security of knowing it will survive a fall if I drop it.

Reviews.Title: My users love them...
Reviews.Author: James McNeese
Reviews.Content: I have several users that I purchased the new iPad for, and they absolutely love them.  The devices were easy to order and they were delivered on time.  I got them up and running in a very short time!!!

Reviews.Title: Brilliant display and speed.
Reviews.Author: Eran Kemp "Eran S. Kemp"
Reviews.Content: This product is absolutely great.  The display is the best I've ever seen, and the speed is faster than my desktop computer.  The only thing I was not happy with is the PRICE.  However, sometimes you have to pay for advanced quality, and I still think it was worth the expense.  My wife is thrilled with her iPad and not found a hiccup yet.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: N
Reviews.Content: It's amazing! It came right on time and was brand new with great packaging I love it and can hardly put it down its a very handy device and I give it two thumbs up.

Reviews.Title: Awesome.
Reviews.Author: Aditya K.
Reviews.Content: Retina screen. Crisp display of images.Magnificent design. More apps that one can use in a lifetime. Worth every penny.Perfect for mail, video watching, photo viewing, music.Alternative to text books comic books and novels. this one rocks.

Reviews.Title: iPad purchase used
Reviews.Author: THB
Reviews.Content: Ok I stepped out and took a chance on used electronic equipment  and bought an iPad.  Though anxiously awaited the delivery time...New York to Nevada requires a degree of patience.. It did arrive two days earlier than promised.  Went immediately to the nearby Apple store for a checkup and training and couldn't have felt more intelligent with my purchase.  It worked like brand new, included 2 protective covers so saved me that add on and I spent $200 less than I expected if I went with the 16gb...and I got the 64gb with high def!!  Thank you amazon, great job once again!!

Reviews.Title: Should have got one long ago
Reviews.Author: H. Crawley
Reviews.Content: Impressive battery lifeOnly issue I have is no USBCould have bought a IPad 3 for cheaper but why cheat myself

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: kristine
Reviews.Content: I LOVE my iPad!  Very convenient, fast, easy to use.  It fully syncs with my iPhone and iMac.  Love it!

Reviews.Title: It's an iPad.
Reviews.Author: Douglas D. Erb "Doug"
Reviews.Content: It's not prolific but it is handy for some things. The retina display is pretty amazing. It is much faster than the original iPad also, which made it a good upgrade.

Reviews.Title: Always wanted an iPad
Reviews.Author: S. Matlow "sm reader"
Reviews.Content: Now I love it.  Also read my books on it besides all other computer fun.  My granddaughters fight over it.

Reviews.Title: I Pad With Retina display or IPad 4
Reviews.Author: FJRBob
Reviews.Content: What a great Toy/instrument of technology. I gave it to my wife as a gift and she hasn't put it down ,Went out a bought " the IPad for seniors " book, She really loves this thing ,I think I have  created a monster . To give something that gives so much joy is such a rewarding feeling .Thanks everyone for letting me make her happy..Bob R.

Reviews.Title: 128gb Ipad
Reviews.Author: Al Rittenhouse
Reviews.Content: My wife loves her Ipad and this one has enough storage for her to do anything. This one replaces a 16gb pad and I received great service from Amazon. Thanks Al

Reviews.Title: Love the Retina Display!
Reviews.Author: Karen Lutz

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it!
Reviews.Author: Pete
Reviews.Content: Great, fast, easy to use - thousands of Apps that install within seconds. Very happy with it and can recommend to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Best iPad Yet
Reviews.Author: Jason Gladstone
Reviews.Content: This is my second iPad and it's the best yet. The faster processor is fantastic and the graphics are beautiful.

Reviews.Title: Las Vegas
Reviews.Author: Burim Sadriu
Reviews.Content: Iped 4 I love it! I never thought I'm gonna like it like that, thank you amazone.I would reccomend this product to all

Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Content: You get an IPAD 4 for the price of an IPAD 3 with this Retna upgrade....I bought this with 128GB..... 3 year SquareTrade full (DROP/SPILL ON IT THEY REPAIR IT warrenty) for less then the AppleCare price with does not include D/S warrenty....so well worth the price....

Reviews.Title: Once again this iPad out shines all the others.
Reviews.Author: lego-man2
Reviews.Content: This does all it says and out shines my iPad 2 . After looking around for sometime for the right price, this was a great find.

Reviews.Title: Great to FaceTime grandchildren!
Reviews.Author: Marie Baran
Reviews.Content: I love it,  I bought it to FaceTime my grandchildren,  my old iPad didn't have the camera,  it is very similar to my old one, but the graphics are better

Reviews.Title: How do people live without an Ipad
Reviews.Author: Devois007
Reviews.Content: This is the single greatest tech gadget we own. It's everything you'd ever want in one device and so simple to operate thanks to apple technology. I recommend springing for the extra GB though as if you like to load it with movies for the kiddo, it can fill up fast.

Reviews.Title: Love my Ipad
Reviews.Author: 4Hand
Reviews.Content: Just like everyone else, I love the Ipad.  It is heavier than I expected, and I was concerned about keeping safe until I got a case for it.  Now I can take it along with no worries.

Reviews.Title: I'm Lovin This Device
Reviews.Author: L.W. "Say something about yourself!"
Reviews.Content: I am so glad I bought this IPAD. My first Ipad.  I have a Kindle Fire and was considering the new Kindle Fire HD.  After reviewing for several days I decided on this IPAD 4.  I really love it.  It is fast...in an area where we still have slow computer speed.  I never used my Kindle for web browsing, it was just too slow.  I use the Apple Ipad to search the web daily.  Friends have told me they stop using their pc's but I don't think I will be able to give up my desktop.  However, I love this Ipad and use it daily.  It is just the right size for me; bright enough I can "see" it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Nestor Reynoza "NJ"
Reviews.Content: Where I am from, it was back ordered for too long, and I got a nice deal from here. I have tried  the iPad 2 and 3, and there is not much difference between the 3 and this one, except that it runs cooler, and wifi seems to give less problems.

Reviews.Title: Another perfection by apple
Reviews.Author: Abhi
Reviews.Content: iPad is most elegant gadget I m having in my life so far. Apple is champion when it comes to user interface experience and iPad is no exception. Only small drawback I can see is that not all apps are yet designed to work on iPad though they work perfectly with iPhone.  But that has no relation with quality of iPad itself and hence my rating goes as 5 star

Reviews.Title: Love Love Love Love it
Reviews.Author: Cornelia S. Williams "connie"
Reviews.Content: Don't know what I ever did without my iPad.  I use it everyday and would really hate to have to be without it for any length of time.  It has nearly replaced my computer.

Reviews.Title: We love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: kristin anderson
Reviews.Content: It makes going away easier since we now don't need to lug around computers. Easy to use. Great gift from our family.

Reviews.Title: I love this iPad But...
Reviews.Author: RusticBeauty
Reviews.Content: I love this iPad, but this bad boy has some weight on it. When holding it for a short period of time, I have to put down and rest my hands.. Other than that, what's not to love? It's a great tablet. It's fast, colorful, capable and fun. I enjoy it very much!

Reviews.Title: Apple Ipad w/Retina Display
Reviews.Author: M. Gonzales
Reviews.Content: I am still on a learning curve, looking for and finding apps which is why I did not give this a five star rating.  Does not work like a computer and it is hard to make the transition.  But so far so good.  This replaces another table I had purchased which was easily returned to Amazon with no problem (thanks Amazon, your the best!)I believe that once I have everything linked, I will love it more.  Have used it to read a Kindle book and watch a movie but I know there is much more that I can do with it.  Will post more once I have had it a bit longer.

Reviews.Title: Can't live without it
Reviews.Author: A. Garza "Amazon Addict"
Reviews.Content: If you're trying to decide between an iPad and a Kindle Fire .. I have both, the iPad is more versatile and you're not stuck with the carousel layout of the Fire. I'm not knocking the Fire it is awesome and perfect for Amazon Prime membership, but as far as versatility and ease of use, go iPad! This vendor shipped in a timely manner, well packaged. Happy buyer.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Michael W. Hoffman
Reviews.Content: I love my new iPad. I have had it a few months now and am still learning all the things It/I can do. I was a little apprehensive at first about ordering this on line in stead of the store.It came in perfect condition and arrived early.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Habib H.
Reviews.Content: Superb...!It is even better than the iPAD3 ,It is definitely faster  and has a little bit better retina display than its predecessorBut it still gets HOT

Reviews.Title: I use this daily
Reviews.Author: ASMEQC
Reviews.Content: I don't really have anything to compare this to however I can say that I use it daily it is nice to be able to sit on the couch and surf the net. The freedom of not being stuck to a desk is great. The battery gives me plenty of charge I do not use it but a few hours of the day and usually only have to charge it every three days. The one thing I do not like that irritates me is that it is not flash compatible. This is the only notepad computer I have used so I really have nothing to compare it to. I would love to get my hands on something using the android operating system to compare. One feature this has that I use a lot is voice dictation which I am using right now it makes entering data very very fast. I do plan on purchasing set of speakers that is Bluetooth compatible, the sound on this is acceptable for general use but if you want to enjoy music external speakers are a must. Note this only has one speaker.

Reviews.Title: ipad retina 32gb, white
Reviews.Author: James R. Henry
Reviews.Content: seems to work just fine...takes and holds charge well.  bought a case/cover for it, too.  like the speed and gyro switching.

Reviews.Title: The nicest, and, very nice to own!
Reviews.Author: Carol Hubbard
Reviews.Content: This is my first iPad. I'm purchasing it for my 66th birthday!! Who else is going to do that but me!!  I'm a gadget person and love technology. When I purchased my iMac (27") desktop - "wow" is all I can say.  It is beautiful. I have the iPhone 4S and I love Siri so I know I will enjoy her on my iPad as well.  The processor for my ipad will be like lightning and I look forward to using the iPad in a more leisurely way,  I've waited to get the newer model for the Retina Display.  Apple technology is great!!  My iPad is on the way Once I use it, I provide more feedback later.  Until then, I'm anxiously awaiting my new toy!Carol

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: marcomb17
Reviews.Content: Justo a tiempo y totalmente nuevo!!!!!!!!!!!!!RecomendadoEmpresa muy seria, sin ningún tipo de complicación.El producto tal como lo describen.Mi ipad 4 excelente!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: fausto
Reviews.Content: This ipad is fantastic. I can realized many works with the help of this product. I think made a good invertion

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: herve pugin
Reviews.Content: very good product, come in time at a good price. works good, I'm to buy this product. I will recommend it

Reviews.Title: It's an iPad!
Reviews.Author: A. Portsmouth
Reviews.Content: This is my second iPad.  Love the improvements; the crystal-clear screen, the camera and the upgraded speed.  I've had a Kindle Fire and a Nook -- and there are dozens of other tablets available -- but NOTHING compares to an iPad.  Period.

Reviews.Title: I'm a convert!
Reviews.Author: John Donovan "jdonovan"
Reviews.Content: I've long resisted getting a tablet, thinking of it as an under powered, limited alternative to a notebook computer--and I have a very nice one of those (Sony Vaio). Well, I was wrong! For traveling--whether to the couch or remote trade shows--I'll be taking my iPad instead of my notebook; there's nothing I'll be doing away from my desktop tower machine that the iPad can't handle. The display is absolutely stunning, the speed is very impressive, and the whole user interface--while slightly confusing to a Windows user--is FAR superior to anything Redmond has turned out. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Apple Rocks
Reviews.Author: FrazierHughescom
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure who I was ordering from but the shipping was fast, the product is mint, and apple by far is the best tablet. Nobody compares. That's why I have two! - HughesitOrLoseIt.com?

Reviews.Title: I love this ipad 4, it just what I like to have, works excellent and response so fast than I aspect. I would strongly recommend.
Reviews.Author: tony guo
Reviews.Content: Also I really appreciated that  "electronicsseller" sent it to me four days before they promised it will take 10 days.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet so far!
Reviews.Author: G1TYSRTS
Reviews.Content: This is the best tablet I have ever had so far. This is actually the first tablet I ever had and love it. It's strong and fast. The screen resolution is too good. It feels like the picture is alive. It suites all my needs, for school and home. I use it for gaming and school work. I just wish all the games were full hd. Other than that, we'll worth the money spent.

Reviews.Title: Ipad 4
Reviews.Author: son nguyen
Reviews.Content: it was good, i like it very much, next time i will your items again. Have a nice weekeend. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Phil L.
Reviews.Content: This iPad is great. Super quick with all the features, speed, and memory that I need. And it is small enough to take anywhere.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Danna Thacker
Reviews.Content: it is more than i expected..i can give my desktop a rest..I've had it a couple months now and couldn't do without it!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great product, solid upgrade from 1st Generation
Reviews.Author: J. Blair
Reviews.Content: This iPad was a replacement for an early iPad.  I have found the changes to be positive and helpful.  After thinking that a camera would have little value I am finding multiple uses for it.  The screen is better although I had no real issue with the Gen 1 Screen.  It seems a bit faster, but, again, I had no real issue with the speed of the earlier model.Overall, good, solid upgrade but no clear "WOW" factor.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Zach
Reviews.Content: Perfect for me and my family. Buy this product if you have kids especially. My daughters use it for many educational games.

Reviews.Title: Everybody loves this product
Reviews.Author: BARTEK PIWONSKI
Reviews.Content: The best ipad ever  we bought for our toddler She simply LOVE IT Thank you Apple for this amaizing product

Reviews.Title: My First Apple product ( was a from me to me New years Gift!)
Reviews.Author: ~AudioBookaHolic~ "Issy"
Reviews.Content: I Can't Wait till it Gets here!! I know I'm Going to LOVE it!! I checked out a friend of mine's ipad and Had to get one! and of course I had to have the 64gb wifi/4g 4th generation....Might as well get all the Bells and Whistles too! while I'm at it...lolMy ipad came yesterday(1/28) and I was Right I LOVEEEEEEEEEEEE it!! Best purchase I EVER made!!! I love all the AWESOME Features and the Siri app is So Cool the picture Quailty is Excellent all the apps Omgggg!! Love them!! music mags Games Photo booth face time the app store itunes you name it it's got it!! Love! Loveee! Loveeeeee! My ipad!!Oooooh I Forgot the battery Life is Beyond Awesome!!!!!

Reviews.Title: great improvement
Reviews.Author: JFB
Reviews.Content: the ipad 4 is an excellent tablet because. it has great battery life that lastest up to 10 hours or more, screen quality with very clear picture, and good sound thats clear and unmuffled.

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: Bob "Bob McD"
Reviews.Content: This iPad is freakin' awesome!  My wife uses it daily for internet searches, downloading pictures, etc.  The graphics are incredible

Reviews.Title: Thanks
Reviews.Author: Francisco A Pineda R
Reviews.Content: Everything Was fine thanks, all the ítems arrived no timé and complete, the ítem is beautiful. . . . .

Reviews.Title: My wife loves it!
Reviews.Author: pacifican
Reviews.Content: SUperior design quality, internet browsing is faster than any other device in our house.I wish Apple would come up with better Maps app. No doubt it is coming.

Reviews.Title: Great product, nice packing fast deliver
Reviews.Author: Jose Acosta Jimenez
Reviews.Content: Product came great shape. Soo fast! Love it, I change to Samsung tab for while couldn't stand it. Love to be back :). Got it when it was 625 $ cheaper than order from the apple store :) since tax in here is soo high :(

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Debbie Boone
Reviews.Content: WEll worth the money and the picture is so clear....fast, and keeps a charge a long time..love love love it..

Reviews.Title: I've been missing out
Reviews.Author: CheeryLB
Reviews.Content: For so long I have been against buying an iPad. I have a 2007 desktop that runs Windows (which I recently ditched for Linux Mint) and it has always been my workhorse. I do a lot of graphic design work, school essays, and quite a bit of writing as a hobby. Last year I purchased a Samsung Galaxy Tab 7 inch and still like it for the most part, but even I--a "no knowledge with a mac" person--must admit the tab and other devices like it don't come anywhere close to the complete experience with the ipad. My main reason for not buy this has been because I had never really gotten my hands on one up close. Then one day my son walked in with one, and I was blown away by the ease of use combined with applications that work so naturally. I spent hours upon days tweaking the galaxy tab and fighting notifications. None of that with this device. It's smooth, durable, and brilliant. I also purchased a Smart Cover which works just fine but I might end up getting one of the clamshell style cases for use as a laptop when I'm out and about. As I type this, the iWork suite is updating in the background and the lightning cable is connected without any slowdown at all. Couldn't get that much out of the android tablet. I am also using the Anker bluetooth keyboard and it works perfectly. If anyone out there is considering a switch from android to ipad, I suggest going for it.

Reviews.Title: Like it better then the Ipad air
Reviews.Author: Yankelovver "Jl"
Reviews.Content: Bought my wife the ipad air and was gonna get myself one but ordered the ipad 4 instead to save some money. Besides being heavier, I just like it better, don't ask me why. It's just feels so much more natural and I'm glad I bought it. If your torn between the Air and this one and a lil extra weight wont bother you. This is a much much better value

Reviews.Title: Glad I Bought the iPad4!!
Reviews.Author: WMR
Reviews.Content: Admittedly, I'm a die-hard windows OS user and droid user. However, after doing much research and talking to other people, I decided to buy the iPad4 for a tablet. So far, I'm not disappointed. I will still use windows-based computers and my Samsung Galaxy droid phone, but I have to admit that when it comes to a tablet, the Apple iPad4 is the way to go!!! WiFi connection is never a problem, the OS is super fast, the retina display is awesome, the feel of the tablet is nice, the sound is okay, the camera takes high quality pics/vids, the battery life is long, and I love all of the apps that are available. Also, I'm in the healthcare profession and often need to reference medical information quickly, so having this tablet provides me with the ability to get information in real time (using medical apps) and/or record notes all while at the patient's side. Overall, a great tool for personal and professional use!!!

Reviews.Title: Do NOT buy from iPadShop
Reviews.Author: Gsoutien
Reviews.Content: iPad Retina display is great but do NOT buy from iPadShop. Advertised as new but you actually get a refurbished one with expired or almost expired warranty. If you have already bought one from iPadShop, make sure to check its warranty with your device Serial Number.

Reviews.Title: Came with wrong and faulty iPad wall charger
Reviews.Author: Samsudin B. Kamis "sambog"
Reviews.Content: I was excited to purchase iPad4 from Amazon at a great price but felt cheated when problem arises after few days.1. When charging, the touch screen was behaving in a very strange way. I cannot click on the icon and screen just acted very strange. It works fine when NOT charging. I brought to Apple Store since it has 90 days warranty and the staff confirmed that my iPad 4 came with a fake and faulty charger. The text on the charger also indicated 10watts and not the original 12watts. The iPad came in an original packing with USB cable but the wall charger was totally fake. I can feel the different in the material too.2. This was another disappointment for iPad4, it is thicker with bigger battery but it take like 4-5 hours for full charge from 50%. Also, when you use it for very long, the ipad get warm. I tried with different wall chargers (original 12W) and it is the same. The charging seem to take longer than the iPad2.I would stay away from iPad 4 is you are thinking of buying it for retina display.UPDATES: Contacted Amazon and the Seller. They suggested that I return the iPad4. I confirmed with Apple that iPad4 is ok and the charger need replacement. After several email exchanges, Amazon refunded me $19 so I can purchase original wall charger with 12 Watts for my iPad4. Kudos Amazon so I am giving the additional star for great customer service but not the product. Hopefully it charges faster now with 12W.

Reviews.Title: A complete game changer
Reviews.Author: The Endz
Reviews.Content: Gotta be upfront, I thought the ipad was ridiculous when it was first announced. It seemed like a giant iphone and a quick way for Apple to once again cash in. Boy was I wrong.It's been less than a week since I got my iPad and I can't imagine being without it. What prompted the purchase was the need to efficiently and quickly take notes for my job that I could later transform into a memo.  It does that. I then rediscovered my love for comics with my subscription to the marvel app. HBO Go makes being away from home and catching up on some of my favorite shows a regular thing. Heck, I don't have a tv in my bedroom but I can now watch live cable tv via an app and the experience is great. I could go on and on. The kindle app, youtube, amazon prime...the list goes on and on, and its only been one week. I love the thing and couldn't recommend it more.
