Reviews.Title: I pad 4
Reviews.Author: Hossamoree
Reviews.Content: One dislike for the charger that get too hot when i charge my ipad , but nothing else , disaponted on charger

Reviews.Title: Super
Reviews.Author: R. Valdez
Reviews.Content: Another Great product from apple. Good batt life, super display. Syncs seamlessly with other apple products. I would recommend to friend

Reviews.Title: Purchsed
Reviews.Author: Daryl PCooley
Reviews.Content: The I pad purchase was an uneventful operation. The order was filled in a timely fashion and the communication was outstanding.

Reviews.Title: Love this IPad!
Reviews.Author: Reviewerthree3103
Reviews.Content: Looks grate, and works magnificently! It is like all the other iPads out there, but more is added to it! Reason for the 4 out of 5 is that the iPad is very expensive, and will evidently need a case when purchased. It is very thin and light weight making it prone to drops. It is however the best tablet I have owned! The display is nice, Siri is very interesting, maps are nice, and the overall speed is great!

Reviews.Title: defective product was resold by Amazon to me
Reviews.Author: Garrick Holmes
Reviews.Content: I purchased this iPad in May 2013 for my wife.  She began using it in June.  By August it was already giving her trouble - the "slide to unlock" switch was not responding.  The iPad could only be launched by closing and re-opening the magnetic cover I had also bought.Then it began acting weirdly.  It self-launched the Notebook and began printing an endless chain of letters - Fffvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv...  Next it self-launched the FaceTime screen.We took it to an Apple store for repair.  When the technician keyed in the serial number on his own screen, he found that this particular iPad had been manufactured in 2011 AND SOLD IN DECEMBER 2012 - five months before I purchased it !!I can only conclude that the original customer returned it to Amazon, which fraudulently resold it to me as a new iPad without having properly repaired it.Fortunately,  the Apple store replaced it for free.

Reviews.Title: UNRELIABLE
Reviews.Author: LE
Reviews.Content: My wife went on a business trip to south-America visiting companies. She wrote all notes in the iPad. On her way back, the iPad spontaneously showed an error (without doing absolutely anything other than turn it on) "This iPad is disabled" and asked to wait for 45 minutes. After 45 minutes all was gone. It started as if the iPad was new. I went to the iPad store and they said that they don't know why this happened and that they have no way to recover any data. All was lost. The best they could do is to exchange it for a different one. The lost data was worth so much more than the iPad.I think is unacceptable that this tablet may destroy the user's data and according to the Apple store employees, there's nothing wrong with it. If the operating system has a problem, user's data should not be deleted, even if it has to start cold.This is the second iPad we have and the second to fail. The first one, a first generation, just stopped charging and we had to pay Apple to exchange it for a different one.The lesson we learned is that this devices may be good for music, photos or any other unimportant tasks, but to me, they are toys.I wouldn't rely on this tablet on anything important.Update: It did it again. I went to an Apple store and they exchanged it. The employee at Apple said that they never saw this failure before. I hope the replaced unit works fine, but anyway we will just trust the important notes to pen and paper.

Reviews.Title: Aggravated
Reviews.Author: John A. Nunnikhoven "Bookworm"
Reviews.Content: I just discovered that this device will not print to my wifi enabled printer a Canon MX882. Now I'm stuck. Throw out a perfectly serviceable printer or set up a Dropbox or Evernote just to print form my laptop. Another major example of the hubris that characterizes so many American manufacturers

Reviews.Title: Still the best
Reviews.Author: Robert Buschkemper
Reviews.Content: This is my second iPad and I am convinced (again), after shopping the market, it is the  best value for tablets on the market.  I also own a Kindle Fire and appreciate it, especially for reading do to its size resolution, but for all around versaatility, endurance and apps iPad is my tablet of choice.

Reviews.Title: Why so expensive?
Reviews.Author: Marek Zalewski
Reviews.Content: The iPads work better than most Apple products, but certainly are not worth the exorbitant price. Two good Android tablets can easily be bought for the price of a single iPad. Maybe not as good, but very, very close.Have used my wife's full-size iPad and sort of like it, but my first generation, 7-inch Kindle Fire is almost as capable and much cheaper.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad with Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Lois H. Gelbert
Reviews.Content: I am unable to give a report because of age and loss of memory because of a stroke.  I was not aware that I would have so much to do to make it enjoyable.  I was hoping to be able to read a book and apply what I have read.  I have the Dummy Book for iPad. It is great reading but I probably have lost far more than I thought I did.  I will not give up because I think it will help me if I can do a few things.

Reviews.Title: Ehh
Reviews.Content: I rate it 3 because, i use to had the itouch second generation and I loved it! It had lots of space! But for my christmas gift I got this iPad. First i was really excited! but then i realizd that you couldnt have much apps, it took AGES for it to be completely charged! and i just dont like it as much as I did with my touch

Reviews.Title: It's all the same
Reviews.Author: Hai Tran
Reviews.Content: I have the first iPad and now the this one and really there isn't that much difference between the two except the retina display. Another thing, if you think you want to use the iPad for your PDF files, think again. It's a lot more trouble just to load the files, not worth it.

Reviews.Title: Never had an iPad before - I love it!
Reviews.Author: J. Page
Reviews.Content: So, this is my first iPad. I had waited and waited until I just couldn't do it anymore! Plus there were so many fellow parents telling me about this great learning app on their iPad for their kids.... My 5 year old son loves it! I put a bunch of games and educational stuff on their and he tools around and really loves it! It is very easy to use, mine arrived nicely packaged and I was able to set it up immediately. I would absolutely recommend this to others.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Joni E. Barker "dimples"
Reviews.Content: Was debating whether to get ipad with phone plan, but glad we got just the wifi ipad. Most places now have wifi, the service plans for iPads are soooo expensive (and of course most wifi is free), and u can download or rent movies that can be watched when no wifi is available (i.e car). Plus u can download a wifi finder so u don't have to HAVE wifi to find places where wifi can be accessed.

Reviews.Title: Recent purchase of Ipad 128GB
Reviews.Author: Robin Breard
Reviews.Content: I recently upgraded my mother's ipad.  The ipad was delivered a day earlier than expected and in good condition.  The product itself is extremely fast and the transition from the old one was easy!  I have nothing negative to say about this product or this purchase, therefore gave it a 5 star rating!

Reviews.Title: All that I expected.
Reviews.Author: Francisco
Reviews.Content: It's all we all know about iPad. Just a slim, elegant, and very great tablet. Apple delivers innovation once again.

Reviews.Title: Apple Ipad 4
Reviews.Author: Reliarick
Reviews.Content: Very good looking and convenient. Lots of free apps and wonderful for entertaining. i have a laptop but now use this much more especially for internet browsing. You can easily put it into sleep mode, put it aside and go to sleep when you are in bed. Its battery can last for days is another thing I love it so much.

Reviews.Title: Power is always running out a d initial set up instructions are lacking
Reviews.Author: Raymond
Reviews.Content: when we first got the IPAD for my wife we tried to set it up ro access our home net work.  I searched settings for the MAC address so I could establish the connection but I was unable to find it.  I ended up opening my network security to estatblish the connection.  Instructions would have been nice or at least thet could have provided a printed MAC setting.My wife is also always complaining that the IPAD after being fully charged it does not last long.  It only last less then 6 hours with frequent use

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: Undunagen
Reviews.Content: The product is very good, however the dealer who sold was not completely honest.It looks like the it was dropped since there is a slight dent on one of the corners.Everything works though.

Reviews.Title: iPad makes commuting better
Reviews.Author: Manny
Reviews.Content: The first day I turned on my new iPad was great and never going back to another tablet. The screeen is gorgeous, fast, and very responsive. If you can afford it, I highly recommend this device.

Reviews.Title: Best in class... till 2013
Reviews.Author: LPaca
Reviews.Content: After months of research and indecision, I bought a refurb iPad 3 from Apple right after the iPad 4 was announced, and then returned it / bought a new iPad 4 over Black Friday. I debated between the iPad 4, mini, Nexus 10, Transformer Prime, and Kindle Fire HD 8.9 (and the Surface tablet for about 5 seconds) and ended up going with the iPad. Here are my thoughts after a month with the iPad and testing the other tablets.Pros1. Smooth user experience - I have a Galaxy S2 for my phone and had a 3GS before that, and though Android for phones is comparable to iOS, the iPad and iOS are seamlessly integrated to optimize load times, switching between apps, etc. while Android tablets sometimes lag2. Battery life3. More apps optimized for tablet / high resolution - everything on the mini looked fuzzy in comparisonCons1. Weight - iPad is heavier than the Nexus 10 and more than 2x the mini2. iOS is probably better suited for phones than for tablets, where android's customization / widgets would make for a better user experienceThe iPad has met my expectations. It's not perfect - lighter and more customization would be nice, but it's best in class for 2012, till the next set of product launches.

Reviews.Title: Love my new Ipad
Reviews.Author: Allen Sanders
Reviews.Content: I have to say, I've gone a long time without an Ipad and watched everyone having fun with theirs... Now It's my turn!  I love the new Ipad with Retina display.  I also love the lightening connector which is super easy to plug in and out without worrying about the direction of the connection.  Weight is a bit heavier than previous Ipad versions, but personally, I can deal.  I couldn't be more satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Can't go wrong - especially as a gift!
Reviews.Author: Breck R. Woodard
Reviews.Content: It was a gift to my daughter, and she was very happy to receive it. Don't forget to buy the screen sheild.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: SpaceCoastMom
Reviews.Content: Had and iPad 2 and moved to the 4th gen.  Love it.  Faster and a beautiful retina display!  Fast shipment and in beautiful condition.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE it!
Reviews.Author: heidi
Reviews.Content: Always wanted an ipad since they came out and never had the money to do it. And now we are the proud owners of one. Thanks amazon!

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: LizaKaye
Reviews.Content: This was a present from my husband that I really wanted. It is great to use and I use it every day. I do not have it tied to any carrier at this time. I use wifi only and bluetooth.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE it!
Reviews.Author: heidi
Reviews.Content: Always wanted an ipad since they came out and never had the money to do it. And now we are the proud owners of one. Thanks amazon!

Reviews.Content: I decided to upgrade to 4th generation - not too interested in Air.  I find I use my iPad more than my laptop or pc.  I love all I can do and just bought a keyboard.

Reviews.Title: iPad

Reviews.Content: This was a present from my husband that I really wanted. It is great to use and I use it every day. I do not have it tied to any carrier at this time. I use wifi only and bluetooth.

Reviews.Title: I appreciate your good deal ..thank you..

Reviews.Content: Thank you for your best deal . I hope you will be the best for ever.I appreciate your deal ...thank you...

Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my 8 year old.  She love, love, love it!  It is well worth money with all the APP that is available on the Apple Eco-system.

Reviews.Content: Got this for my aunt and it's brand new, just as described. Got the $20 prepaid data (2Gb) by calling Verizon and it worked perfectly within 2 minutes. Perfect for anyone who would be on the road for a trip and needs data access.

Reviews.Content: I ordered an Apple iPad, and instead I received a Beats Pro headset, I don't know if its just an amazon thing or if its their personal policy but you can't even contact them personally to tell them what happened, all communication is through email which makes it even more difficult to get them to right their mistake, i paid a lot of money on a Birthday present that almost didn't get here and than when it did, it wasn't what i ordered, I won't be buying from this seller again and I'm sure neither will the guy who's missing his headset...!

Reviews.Title: Supper great iPad!!!

Reviews.Content: I had a I-pad 3rd generation and it was stolen by a Thrifty car rental  employee in Key West Airport!! I purchased this and love it. The 4th generation is great. I would recommend  purchasing from Amazon anytime!!

WOW.

Reviews.Title: excellent

Reviews.Title: A Most Elegant Electronic Device

Reviews.Content: I bought this ipad as a birthday gift for my wife. I don't personally use Apple stuff but was none the less impressed with this device. It was extremely easy for my wife to set up and sync with her iphone. She has not had any problems with it whatsoever, the screen is beautiful, and I didn't have to do anything technical for her. (I'm the tech guy in the family) Birthday done, wife stoked, totally easy. My only complaint, the device is a bit pricey. It's an Apple product, nuff said.

Reviews.Content: I appreciate ipad design and great content especially the possibility to be connected everywhere with possibility of listenning radios and watching TV worlldwide. I will recommend ipad to all my contacts. Great job!

Reviews.Title: Apple IPad with Retina Display MD514LL/A 32GB
Reviews.Author: Lindy Matherly "I like to read Christian, par...
Reviews.Content: I really like the size, the crisp photos. I have a IPhone & IMac it is great that I can sync all 3 with just a setting.

Reviews.Title: My new iPad
Reviews.Author: Mookie
Reviews.Content: I really love it.  It's beyond my expectations.  I'm so glad I bought it.  Thank you Amazon. Your price was the best

Reviews.Title: Apple Ipad
Reviews.Author: bear22 "Gary Parmentier"

We've had it for over 3 weeks and after calls and visit to Apple store have unable to get Face Time to work.  We have tried at several different venues so that seem to rule out router problems.  Heard rumor that Apple itself is having problems with "Face Time"  Not too Happy!

Reviews.Title: Bought as a gift

Reviews.Content: This was a purchase for my mother. She has already gotten hours of enjoyment and I expect she will for years to come. Awesome buy for the price and with 64gb. She will have a unit that's usable for a long time to come.

Reviews.Title: Best Buy..Love this!

Reviews.Content: Works well, mine in wi fi and sprint enabled.  Sprint does not have unlimited data option.  I would have selected another cell carrier had I known and the limited data options are quite expensive.  Mass deleting of emails is more of a chore than it should be.

Reviews.Title: Just as described

Reviews.Title: Best tablet you can buy!!!!

Reviews.Content: Best ipad you can by in my opinion besides the 128GB version in the same model. Fast, Beautiful Display and more apps than any other platform.

Reviews.Title: Birthday gift

Reviews.Content: It was a birthday gift for our daughter, who tells us that she loves it, is using if for both personal and business (teacher) purposes/

Reviews.Author: vark

Reviews.Title: THE PURCHASE OF MY APPLE AIR IPAD

It is everything I've read & heard about &more.; The screen is the perfect size for me and I love the quick start up.They have made a wonderful product which makes  using the internet a breeze..I just wish they would include a users manual with the product because there is so much more to learn about.R.D.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!

Reviews.Title: First apple product

Reviews.Title: Ipad 4 is the best

Reviews.Title: Ipad is great

Reviews.Content: No issues..easy to use. My wife wants one.it is heavier than her kindle. Need this for work as it is the only OS we can use for my job.

Reviews.Title: Love it love it love it!!!

Reviews.Content: I always wanted the iPad but knew they coul be pretty pricey but this was the best deal around and we could not be happier! We love having the 128 GB so we have plenty of storage. Absolutely amazing!

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Shirley Flowers
Reviews.Content: Got my new I Pad Love using it at church and every where I go. It has all the best features I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: apple fan

Reviews.Content: every thing I expected from Apple! Can now use all the apps I have been longing to use!  Love my games!

Reviews.Title: IPad w/retina 4 th Generation
Reviews.Author: Shirley A Jones
Reviews.Content: My Ipad w/ retina Outstanding and picture excellant! Easy to follow.Most of all keep all of the icons inordet. Shirleyj

Reviews.Title: iPad/Retina/4th Gen.
Reviews.Author: OBH
Reviews.Content: It's got every thing I need and the apps work really well that I have installed so far.  Am using the iPad with a wireless "bore scope" and it is wonderful for this use and pictures too.  The weight vs the iPad Air are not an issue for my uses and I didn't need those other extras.

Reviews.Title: Fast, fast, fast
Reviews.Author: Janet
Reviews.Content: I have had an IPad 2 for the past 2 years, which I liked. I decided to upgrade, but did not see any great advantage to getting and IPad Air for the extra bump in money.  We live very rural with no internet access, only the 3G on the iPad. I thought the slow download on the 2 was because of our setting - videos were out, pictures took a long time - so when we got the iPad 4, I was pleasantly surprised!  We can watch videos, download stories and generally just peruse the internet while not putting it down and doing something else while it loads!  The picture is marvelous, clear and sharp!  I did not think that would be so important but does make for good reading.  Overall, very glad I made the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Loving it!
Reviews.Author: Kendra Hinman
Reviews.Content: I'm a first time iPad owner, and I'm loving this device.  Chose the 4th generation to save a little money and I'm not disappointed.  Easy and Fun!

Reviews.Title: My first apple product
Reviews.Author: Nancy Sederberg
Reviews.Content: I have been amazed that it is so easy to use this iPad.  I am still learning, and don't know how to use all the features yet.  But my 12 year old grandson has been giving me tips and helpful advice over the phone.  The screen is bright and easy to read.  The features are very intuitive.  I highly recommend this product

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad with Retina Display 64

Reviews.Content: Bought this as an upgrade since my wife took my iPad 2 as her own.  Quicker and faster that the 2 and the screen is much better.

Reviews.Title: iPad............Glad I bought it

I purchased an iPad mini and was less than satisfied with it. I decided to purchase a regular sized iPad and I am very satisfied with my purchase. Thank you!!!!

Reviews.Title: very nice with my Ipod

Reviews.Content: I didn't have a time to working too much in my iPod, buth great so far, thank you, apple is always good

Reviews.Title: Very happy

It is 100 times better than my old lap top, it's faster, and easier to carry around.  The screen has a crisp image.  I can do so many things on the iPad from surfing the net to watching videos and playing games.  How did I ever survive without my iPad?

Reviews.Title: Good Price, Great Delivery
Reviews.Author: J. Johnson
Reviews.Content: Not only is my nw iPad 4 fast with a gorgeous screen, this seller exceeded my expectations by delivering the item several days before it was expected. Good job! I'm completely satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Great product

Reviews.Content: Exactly what I was expecting. The iPad is awesome to have. The retina display is amazing for movies and games.

Reviews.Title: Loving it!

Reviews.Content: Have had no problems with it, easy to use.  Product came to me on the date expected, still in the plastic.  I am very pleased with this purchase and am looking for one for my husband.

Reviews.Title: i cant put it down

Reviews.Content: i cant put it down! im so happy with this purchase. I wanted one forever and now i have one!

Reviews.Title: I love It!

Reviews.Title: Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Woks as expected
Reviews.Author: Daniel P. Malaney
Reviews.Content: It is easy to use, but could have come with instructions for those unfamiliar with Apple products.  Slightly heavy to hold.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 4th generation

Reviews.Content: I bought it as a gift for my sister and she is amazed by it. I told her to take the free Apple classes that is offered and she is in the process of doing that. She is one happy person.

Reviews.Title: More glitches and crashes
Reviews.Author: B. Stasiak "dr.brittster"
Reviews.Content: I'm convinced people go crazy over apple products solely because of the out of control trend of owning everything apple. Personally, my iPad has crashed and glitches constantly since day one, on an every day basis. I replaced it. Same problem. There are so many better products out there, but somehow the iPad is rated as number one everywhere you go. Sure, the access to apps are nice. But I've had cheap laptops with far less problems, and you could actually use it for more than apps and web browsing. Way over priced.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Blair Stephenson
Reviews.Content: It's not as powerful a processor as the AIR nor as light of course but a fine item to have

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Clay
Reviews.Content: Answered all questions I had and came in just 3 days! iPad I bought no scratches look brand new! 5 Star!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Keven L. Barber
Reviews.Content: Retina Display is great.  Ability to use cellular service when wifi too slow worth it's weight in gold. Great Product!

Reviews.Title: Present for wife
Reviews.Author: LowMetallurgy
Reviews.Content: No complaints here.  Typical Apple reliability, usability, and more importantly, the wife loves it!  Plenty of storage for our needs.

Reviews.Title: Lovelock lovelock!
Reviews.Author: Nancy S. "NancyBookWorm"
Reviews.Content: That sums it up!  This is the best device yet and so I am now Apple-happy.  I tell everyone to buy one over a laptop because it is faster, more easily portable and very user friendly.  The price was comparable, arrived safely on time.  I only use my laptop now for printing jobs (next time we get a wireless printer to use with my iPad) and longer documents.

Reviews.Title: Love my iPad
Reviews.Author: Jake
Reviews.Content: This was a gift from my family & I love it, easy to use with long battery life, great in the garden or the house.

Reviews.Title: Does exactly what I expected
Reviews.Author: G. Unlimited
Reviews.Content: While I would love to see a card reader and a usb or port of some kind for data transfer the purpose of this review isn't to try to redesign the iPad. It's exactly what I expected when I bought it and it does what I need for it to do (and more) very well.

Reviews.Title: I pad 3
Reviews.Author: Don R.
Reviews.Content: the only problem is I cant get it to charge from my ac addapter and ac outlet! it only charges from a radio shack power source that is portable.  not sure why

Reviews.Title: excellent,
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I gave my wife my old Ipad and bought this one, I love it, use it for everything.  Do a lot of reading with it and it works great.  Does most anything I need, hardly use my laptop anymore.  It is not dramatically different from my old one.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: THERESE E FULLEN
Reviews.Content: Love the product, the price was great, the shipping was within reason given the time of year, I ordered early as this was a christmas gift and had it in plenty of time.  the iPad is a great product, I purchased this for my husband as Ive had mine for over two years and love it, he was using a big bulky laptop and this is perfect for around the home for him, he loves to watch DIY videos etc. and the screen is nice size for this.

Reviews.Title: Like it

Runs great with iOS 7, plays games/movies without any issues, is wicked fast, and the retina display is gorgeous.Pros:Retina displayPlays games/movies flawlessly.Wicked fastCons:Capacity, I can't store many HD movies on here - wish I saved a little longer and bought the 64gb version.

Reviews.Title: Best Apple Product great for college
Reviews.Author: Brooks Langford
Reviews.Content: The best thing I have ever bought on Amazon and I have bought some pretty great things.  My favorite Apple product and i actually own a 5S and a Macbook Air.

Reviews.Title: What did you expect?
Reviews.Author: MrsP
Reviews.Content: I can't come up with a single complaint.  It's an Apple, it's an Ipad, everything works perfectly, I got a great price.  What else!

Reviews.Title: Amazing. We love it. THE ONLY TABLET TO EVER BUY! Imitators can't even come close.
Reviews.Author: Kurt P
Reviews.Content: Amazing. We love it. THE ONLY TABLET TO EVER BUY! Imitators can't even come close.Incredible battery lifesuper fast and responsiveyou can feel the quality once you hold it in your handthe RETINA DISPLAY is AMAZING!!!! Never go back to a regular display after using itwith apple TV you can steam content from your iPAD to your TV in real time. Pictures, Movies, music, games etc...I would recommend this tablet to ANYONE. You can't go wrong with this device. You will NOT be disappointed. Their is a reason why Apple is the industry leader and it's because of devices like this. Don't fall for cheaper imitators and look a likes. Nothing compares to the iPad.

Reviews.Title: An amazing platform for browsing, media, and iOS apps!
Reviews.Author: C-Dub
Reviews.Content: I was slow to justify the cost of an iPad and despite being a long time fan of Macs, didn't really see the need for one. I found myself in a job where I am on very remote locations with quite a bit of downtime and finally decided that I could use one.I have been absolutely thrilled with this device. It is extremely stable, even with the new iOS 7 operating system. I am very happy that I chose the Retina model, because the screen is basically perfect. For everything from web browsing to watching Netflix, the quality of video and images is second to none.App performance on the iPad Retina is superb, and many of the iPad specific apps are simply mind-blowing, particularly some of the art apps like Sketchbook Pro and Procreate. I recently acquired an Adonit Jot 4, which is a pressure sensitive stylus that connects via Bluetooth, and it works like something out of the future. Just crazy good. For forum participation, writing Amazon reviews, etc., I prefer my laptop simply because I don't like typing on a touchscreen, but that's just my personal preference. I can get around on the touchscreen and if I really wanted a physical keyboard, there are several available. But that's not really what the iPad is all about. It's not there to replace your computer; it's a different type of device that excels at browsing and media consumption and is portable in a way that no laptop is.Though it takes a bit longer than I would like to take a full charge, the battery life is excellent, and I rarely find myself needing to charge when I am out and about.As a media consumption / web browsing device, the iPad Retina is ideal. The screen is so amazing that it is generally preferable to me over a larger computer or laptop screen for these purposes. I take a star off of my rating because USB connectivity would be REALLY helpful for those who would like to watch movies that they have stored on an external drive. There really is no reason that the iPad shouldn't have USB.I love my iPad, and it is so usable in this current configuration that I don't see myself having to replace it with the latest and greatest for many years.

Reviews.Title: very cool
Reviews.Author: TSKPP
Reviews.Content: My first ipad! Yay..Love it. I got the 32gb and Im able to have all the apps i want so far. I use for educational purposes with students so i download a lot of apps for work, reinforcement, and fun. I have 96 apps so far and still have over 95% of my space avalible. I have some pretty big ones for gaming that i thought would take up some space but nope, still got a long ways to go. Anyhow love ipad way better than andriod for my use of it!

Reviews.Author: Stephen Sedillo

Reviews.Content: I love apple products. In a side by side with earlier models I honestly didn't notice much of a difference. I needed the newer model for work. I definitely recommend getting a case as one drop could shatter the screen and that is not cheap to fix.

Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband as anniversary present. He is so thrilled with it. It replaced an older version and he is like a kid in a candy store with all of the new features. Loves the Retina Display on it as well.

Reviews.Content: loved this ipad - just got the air and there is not much difference.  If I needed one again, I would save the money and go with this one.

Reviews.Content: I've had my ipad for about a month now and I have to say I'm very pleased. This is the 1st apple product I've bought and I have to admit they won me over and I finally found out what all the fuss was about. It's easy to use and figure out. I like it's size bc it's easy on the eyes. I also bought a wireless keyboard so I can do my blogging and other things that require a lot of typing and found it very useful. So far, I like it and I'm really enjoying it. I can't wait to get an iphone so I can sync my devices together.

Reviews.Title: iPad 4th Generation Review
Reviews.Author: Nadine Cummington
Reviews.Content: I love this new iPad, it is quick, seamless, and the retina display is wonderful! When I first heard about the Retina display, I was sort of shocked by it and a bit doubtful. I thought there was no way that they can make the display any better... but I was wrong, it looks better than any still photo! It looks more real, realer. It is absolutely amazing. I got the 16GB Wifi only and have not had a problem with it once. I did get this one since I was not interested in the iPad Air that they had coming out, and I already had a 7 inch Kindle, so I was not interested in the iPad mini that was already on sale.I do not regret this purchase at all, everything on it works wonderfully, I got a Fintie case for it that rotates which is wonderful, and I must say that this iPad is the only thing in the world that is as close to perfect as anything or anyone can get. Pictures look wonderful, games look fantastic, and The Cloud works very well on this device. There is no set up time, just enter your email and password (or make an account) and that is it you are ready to use/share on The Cloud.I have to say now after experiencing Apple and their products, I now will be purchasing all their products (the products that I need) so they can all work together and accommodate one another. Right now I have an iMac and iPad and they work wonderfully together. Syncing my PC takes a bit more time, but it does indeed work. Although it is not as quick or seamless as my Apple products syncing with each other, but of course they are using the same iOS, etc. so that is understandable.This device is a masterpiece, best little computer there is, and is a absolute pleasure to have.5 stars all the way!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!

After about a month I still have so much to learn (ie there is so much the iPad 5 has to offer). The iPad will not replace your computer.  If. I also purchased an Otterbox Defender Hornet Series case to protect the IPad, which I highly recommend.  The iPad has an outstanding battery life, the applications are functional and streamlined into the system for an effortless use.  The are many free apps for leisure activities , as well as for professional applications such as Microsoft power point, excel, and word. I'm impressed with the wireless printing function, which integrates well with documents, photos, and spread sheets. Reviews.Title: A Terrific Product For Special Needs Children
Reviews.Author: Stasia Nielsen "tiastasia"
Reviews.Content: This was an incredible help for us as a family.  We have a daughter with Autism and although she is high functioning, as any parent of a special needs child knows, life holds many challenges for special needs families.The iPad came in the box ready to go.  I simply plugged it into the wall and the wifi picked up all the tablet needed to know.  This made life easier for me.  It connected right to my iTunes account and I was easily able to share her special apps.We use it mainly to calm her, and direct her with terrific apps such as ChoiceWorks and other learning tools.  She began communicating much better and when we are out, we bring it with the headphones so she can listen to music.  We have noticed a decrease in frustrating meltdowns.I use it often as well, for writing and for other work related things I do that needs a computer on the go.  ALl of my desktop programs have apps that I can access and upload via the iPad.  I truly love it.
