Reviews.Author: Yunus Emre
Reviews.Content: İt is nice. easy to use. because it is useful. i recommend to everyone. if you ne tablet, you can buy this

Reviews.Title: Great, have been using it for e-mail and work.
Reviews.Author: Edward G. Wong
Reviews.Content: Clarity of image on the screen is unbelievable, very happy with product.  Only wish I had known they would be coming out with newer iPad so soon before I bought this iPad.

Reviews.Title: Girlfrieds new toy
Reviews.Author: Samie VanGilder
Reviews.Content: hey, she is absolutely in love with it so it gets rave reviews from me. I dont play on it that much as I prefer the mini.  She is elated over it though.

Reviews.Title: Good service
Reviews.Author: Usha Lalloo
Reviews.Content: I had a problem with my order and WWD worked with me to resolve the matter in a timely manner.  I truely appreciate the excelent service they provided to get my product to me.

Reviews.Title: shipped quickly and is working well in our office
Reviews.Author: Erin Daniels
Reviews.Content: The product shipped quickly and has been working out great in our office.  I was nervous about not buying from Apple directly but this seems to be doing fine.

Reviews.Title: I've had all the iPads...
Reviews.Author: Chris Butilier
Reviews.Content: and this is a great new addition to the line-up with its retina display, and everything else it comes with. I would not likely buy one now until the line is updated, as I bought this quite a while ago and am waiting for the next release. If you can't wait, then this will certainly fulfill all of your tablet needs!

Reviews.Title: Excellent resolution!!!
Reviews.Author: Leslie Castro "Silly Titi"
Reviews.Content: The resolution of the new retina display was above my expectations.  It is even more clear than some mirrors....  I have thought about using it to fix my eyebrow, while I have not actually done it yet.  ;-))

Reviews.Title: Fantastic. This is a great iPad
Reviews.Author: Richard Dubey
Reviews.Content: I had my doubts and was really hoping for the best when I ordered a "Used" iPad 4. But it came with all the original equipment, didn't have a mark on it, and has been functioning flawlessly since I got it. I would have preferred the seller would have let me know that a signature was required to receive it (I had to get a friend to hang out at my house for the afternoon while I was at work to sign for it). But, other that that annoyance, I am very happy with the product.

Reviews.Title: Superb...
Reviews.Author: Artur
Reviews.Content: Great product as every Apple item. Fast shipment. Everything works great. I recommend it to every IT admin who works a lot like me... I'm completly satisfied...

Reviews.Title: as i expected
Reviews.Author: Daya "IamMe"
Reviews.Content: this was a gift to my wife for her birthday. she is expecting and enjoying the ipad features with ease. her laptop is on vacation :)

Reviews.Title: Never Received Ipad
Reviews.Author: Country Bumpkins
Reviews.Content: Somethings amiss here, whenI saw the newest Ipad for $125 less than everywhere else I was suspicious, but thought with Amazon backing me uo I would be fine. I ordered it and they said it had shipped,, but the package was not tracking. About a month later after being annoyed (where is my Ipad) i did get a full refund, as I would expect from Amazon, but it was a bad shopping experience.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Brion Douvis
Reviews.Content: Im loving it. Fr met my needs. Arrived a little late. Though I like the retina screen and all the features

Reviews.Title: Great I-pad
Reviews.Author: Chris Stanton
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife so she can Skype with the kids and grandkids and play her games on instead of on her phone.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Difei Zhou
Reviews.Content: I m a pilot,the iPad helps me a lot,I do not need to take so many books with me any more. The iPad 4 also did vary well in games

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: Girlybug
Reviews.Content: I finally got on the IPAD bandwagon. I absolutely love it! I am still learning how to used it, compatible applications and what accessories are available.  Woohoo!!!

Reviews.Title: My 2nd iPad
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Deal
Reviews.Content: I purchased my first iPad over a year ago - what was that?  the iPad 2, I think?  I used it every single day and loved it...but my husband was starting to get jealous.  Even though he had a laptop, he wanted a tablet, too. So, like any good husband, he bribed me.I could get a brand new iPad if he could adopt my older one.  DEAL!!!So now I'm the proud owner of the iPad with Retina display.  I will tell you.....I really don't notice much of a difference between this one and my older one.  But, I still love it!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Mauricio
Reviews.Content: I love Apple! I have the iPhone 5 and the iPod touch 4th gen, and this was something missing. Ccertainly the iPad with retina display is awesome!

Reviews.Title: Love!
Reviews.Author: sherry mangum
Reviews.Content: I have been trying to decide on iPad or new laptop. I researched both and I believe this is perfect for me. I am in my forth year of college and have four more of pharmacy school. I will need to take with me to class and library. I also bought a keypad and printer that is compatible with my iPad. All is easy to use and does everything my laptop did. I feel like I made the right decision! I highly recommend the iPad! But be sure and get a protection plan! Hope I don't have to use it but better safe than sorry! (Parents won't buy me another.)

Reviews.Title: I love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Mara melucci
Reviews.Content: This product exceed expectation! I wanted it especially for reading book, and yes.. It s perfect! I really love it

Reviews.Title: Fast
Reviews.Author: Robert E. Porter
Reviews.Content: Very fast, and that's a key reason for my purchasing. No probs at all thus far. Video out doing great.

Reviews.Title: First Ipad
Reviews.Author: Rod Stevens "Rod from Florida"
Reviews.Content: This is really a quality piece of electronics.  I must admit there is a learning curve, but if you have an Iphone, its pretty much the same setup.  Couldn't get some info from my PC transferred to my new Ipad, but technical support was very helpful.  The only thing I am really disappointed about is the fact that Apple products don't support Adobe Flash, making it impossible to download some of my favorite internet sites.

Reviews.Title: I have one so gave one to kids for wedding gift
Reviews.Author: Donna F.
Reviews.Content: I stewed over what to get them and then when I spoke with them they told me they were going to try to pick up a used iPad. Having used my 2 year old nephews older model I knew my tekkie kids would absolutely hate short the battery life so we splurged and got them this one. Best wedding gift they got! The display is fantastic and they are finding that, like me, they tend to take it everywhere.

Reviews.Title: another Apple winner!
Reviews.Author: Drew E.
Reviews.Content: I'm a "Mac Guy", so slipping into this was beyond easy! Coupled with my Snugg leather cover, it's a great "go-between" from my ipod and Mac Book. I wouldn't hesitate recommending it to anyone, and especially through Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: kikealtamirano
Reviews.Content: Was what I wanted, works perfect and It's not heavy, helps me a lot with all my daily work at home.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Ralph Burgess
Reviews.Content: Excellant, the screen is a perfect size and very easy to use. Loved the camera feature and overall functions of the iPad.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied with these products.
Reviews.Author: Rosemary Bell
Reviews.Content: These products exceeded my expectations.  I am enjoying the convenience, compared to my pc.  I am still learning how to use all of the functions.  I am enjoying different aspects, such as the camera and how easy it is to take a picture and immediately  send it to friends.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT LOVE IT LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Charlotte E Ostermann
Reviews.Content: I had an IPAD2 but wanted more GB so got this IPAD. The Retina display is amazing!! I have been taking pictures on my IPHONE with HRD....when you see them on the IPAD they are simply beautiful. Also any of the Apps that are in HD are terrific. I love the IPAD...so easy to,use but I am a little prejudice when it comes to Apple. We have IMACs..Air Books..mini IPads..IPhones..IPODS...what's not to love!???????

Reviews.Title: Best purchase EVER
Reviews.Author: 1stTD
Reviews.Content: I love my iPad !! Other than my car, this has to be my favorite purchase EVER!! It is fun, easy to use, and extremely handy. It takes marvelous pictures and videos. It amazes me how much my iPad can do...

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: Fa.N
Reviews.Content: This is amazing tablet i have ever seengreat resolution , I love apple products . so many new features

Reviews.Title: From PC back to Mac
Reviews.Author: norman rhoads
Reviews.Content: I gave up my Mac years ago when I moved to Italy. The service here then was very hard to find. Now I have gone back with my Ipad and it is just perfect.What is with Itunes ? They keep telling me that all my credit cards are not valid in Italy. I have been living here and using Amex and Visa, both debit and credit cards for seventeen years. They refer me to my card providers and the card folks say they don't understand the problem. What good is this wonderful machine if I can't get Itunes to let me use my account?Norman Rhoads

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Product
Reviews.Author: Jake
Reviews.Content: Package arrived in an easy open box; I-Pad unpacked easily, charged and ready to operate.  No instruction manual needed, set-up was user-oriented and very intuitive.  My first Apple product.  Don't know why I didn't buy one years sooner!

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Maureen Farrell
Reviews.Content: I reallt like the Apple Ipod.  I kept going back and forth between the Kindle and Ipad and I am glad I purchased it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: JASB
Reviews.Content: iPad is the best thing I've spent money on. It didn't take long at all to get to me. No damage to it or the box. Was packed so nothing would happen to it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Diana
Reviews.Content: Love our I pad and thought it would be a great gift for our nieces husband. He drives a truck and sometimes he has to stay over night. A great gift for him. He loves it!!!!It was delivered earlier than expected, which was great.  Would recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Love my new iPad!!
Reviews.Author: j.k.
Reviews.Content: Got mine for 550.  It works great! It's strange using this iPad then going to my iPhone..  It makes the iPhone look so small and I feel like I'm going blind when I look at my iPhone after using the iPad for a while.  Great product!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Jerry E. Klein
Reviews.Content: First time user of the Apple iPad. Did not take long to figure things out. It also helps to have a younger person around to show you how to do some things.

Reviews.Title: L
Reviews.Author: renan
Reviews.Content: I love My iPad That was a great bye. brand-new in the box like Good price I recommended to everybody

Reviews.Title: Great !!!
Reviews.Author: Manuel Gonzalez Flor
Reviews.Content: Had iPad 2 but this one is way better, retina display is superior. Wish I bought the 128 gig one!!!

Reviews.Title: Great new addition
Reviews.Author: Gary C. Linn
Reviews.Content: although I have only had the I-Pad for q couple of weeks, I am enjoying it immensely. I have not yet learned all of the nuances yet, but the possibilities for greater enjoyment are there.I have not been  away from home to use it , which is where I will enjoy it most.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Kevin Cragun
Reviews.Content: I have purchased a few iPads over the years, passing along the used ones to my daughters.  They have all worked fine.  Nice tool. Nice toy.

Reviews.Title: i like it a lot
Reviews.Author: bebe
Reviews.Content: i like it a lot but its expensive, other than that everything is awesome, specially the screen it has a really good quality

Reviews.Title: Still best tablet on the market
Reviews.Author: M. Volkan gebologlu
Reviews.Content: For an android user for phone and be a fandroid boy if you need  a tablet just buy an ipad

Reviews.Title: Recommendation
Reviews.Author: Eugene Sanchez
Reviews.Content: To all people that I work with to every body in my family and every tha I know Evento my boss

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: chas
Reviews.Content: great product does so much had first one out and now this one I  like big hard drive can watch alot of movies

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Jackie White
Reviews.Content: I love my ipad. I hardly ever use my laptop anymore. It is a wonderful device, but that is coming from someone who likes apple products. Seriously, if you are considering getting an ipad go for it!! They are fun and offer a lot of great apps that I plan on using for my classes when I start school in the fall.

Reviews.Title: iPad 4 32G wifi - Love it
Reviews.Author: a.z.
Reviews.Content: Love the iPad. Anti-glare screen protectors are not the best ones for this device. Once the clear ones arrive, I will be able to enjoy the retina display fully.

Reviews.Title: Great but beware
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: After three attempts I think I finally have a good ipad.  My first one the forward camera stopped working and I had to send it back.  The second one came from the IPADSHOP fulfilled by Amazon and when I checked the warranty it was used and only had 6mo of warranty left.  The box was wrapped in plastic to make it look new but was obviously not the same plastic that comes from the factory.  I have read of others having the same experience with the ipadshop.  So, google apple warranty check and check your serial number to make sure it is a new one. Amazon was great as usual and I had no problems returning the defective one and the used one.  They even waved the shipping on the third because of what happened.  Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: It's the original touch screen tablet. Enough said, right?
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: The 4th generation iPad is an iPad - that's enough to get the point across, right? We all know the iPad is the touch screen equivalent of the gold medal - others have come & gone, but it's still what every other tablet is compared to. Regarding this model, the only major difference between the 4th generation & the 3rd is a more powerful processor, but the amazing Retina screen remains the same - & as someone with a 2013 Macbook Air too which doesn't have a Retina display, the Retina screen is quite a difference.  I use my MA more for computing, while the iPad (to me) is more of an entertainment device - & its screen is definitely perfect for it.  Pixelation is all but a thing of the past with this baby!  Overall, I use this for Netflix & YouTube (& occasionally checking email, Facebook, etc.), but really, for a tablet & everything that goes with that, the iPad is everything you could ask for.

Reviews.Title: Great for emails
Reviews.Author: Rita Foster "Reading Fiend"
Reviews.Content: This is great or traveling and emails anytime.  There is so much to learn and so many apps to use.  I am still learning.

Reviews.Title: My New Appendage
Reviews.Author: Dusty
Reviews.Content: My iPad seems to be attached to me now, as I hardly ever put it down.  My poor laptop is lonely and sad because I hardly ever touch it anymore.  This thing does everything!  The photos that it takes are much better than the ones I take with my camera.  It's perfect for FaceTime with family that lives far away.  So lightweight and easy to use.  I don't use my kindle anymore either, since it's easier to read with the iPad.  Can't say enough nice things about it! ☺

Reviews.Title: Very Happy!
Reviews.Author: Gregory
Reviews.Content: Got just what I wanted. It was exactly as described and definitely exceeded my expectations with the item being used.

Reviews.Title: Loving it!
Reviews.Author: Chad Seelye
Reviews.Content: I've been an iPhone user for years, so I knew what to expect, but the larger screen size has been great!

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Lin Gan
Reviews.Content: I got this because I was bored but have always felt turned off and intimidated by technology.  So when it arrived I did not open the box for weeks until a friend came to visit and set the whole thing up for me.  Now I use it all the time and really love it.

Reviews.Title: Favorite purchase of the year
Reviews.Author: Alicia Willis
Reviews.Content: When I first got it my music wouldn't download from the cloud. Went to local apple store reset the iPad and it was perfect. The iPad is wonderful,I take it with me everywhere. It's really fast the retina display makes pics vivid.

Reviews.Title: Great job!
Reviews.Author: Edson Brandao
Reviews.Content: I received it quickly and with no problems.I love to use Amazon for my shoppings. It is easy and secure.Excelent experence!brandao

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted
Reviews.Author: NICUNurse
Reviews.Content: It's perfect for everything I need to do. My kids love to play games on it. And it's the perfect size to take everywhere..

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 64 GB
Reviews.Author: Slim Smithie
Reviews.Content: Used an iPod for three years then went to an iPhone 5 before breaking down and spending the money for the iPad.  I have a computer that hardly gets used anymore since this purchase. As long as there is a Wi-Fi close by it gets used.Even watch Netflix movies, text, play games, search web. This thing is really nice!

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Camile Bailey
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for one of my nephews and he has had no complaints.  It works as intended.  He loves it and carries it everywhere.  The retina display is brilliant and really brings the games he plays to life in vibrant, stunning colour.

Reviews.Title: Ipad
Reviews.Author: aniew
Reviews.Content: Ipad is great.  It is very light weight and does most of the functions of a laptop.  It also holds a charge for about  10 hours.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded my expectations
Reviews.Author: corbett w langdon
Reviews.Content: Changes pages very fast,has apps for anything,very good camera,very easy to take pictures and email.Am sure I will like better over time.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: KMac
Reviews.Content: Easy to use.  The size is perfect. Big enough to see everything and small enough to take around.  Good for someone who has an iPhone.A little expensive though.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Amazing Mimi
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with my new IPad, I take it every where with me.  Easy set up and very easy to read and use.

Reviews.Title: Anniversary Gift
Reviews.Author: Palatine Dad
Reviews.Content: I purchased this iPad as a gift for my wife for our 6th wedding anniversary.  She loves it.  She still loves her desktop but finds this product much more convenient.  It is especially great for our road trips.  I highly recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my wife. she so wanted a tablet. I searched for a tablet for awhile before deciding on this ipad. It is wonderful.the colors are georgeuos.I do have one complaint though. I ordered a white one because this is what my wife was asking for. When it came the box said white but when she opened it , it was black she would not let me return it but she was visibly disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great Quality
Reviews.Author: Brookestar
Reviews.Content: I got my iPad this past Christmas (2012) as a gift from my parents. Overall, it is very good. I recommend students to buy an iPad and a SmartCase instead of a computer, because it is way easier to transport my iPad around than our family laptop. If you do digital art, I recommend an iPad because (from my personal experience) I've had a much easier time doing my art on my iPad than on my iPod touch. I will warn you that you do not want the screen to be as bright as it can be, because your battery will drain quickly. Also, be careful about the apps you buy and how many photos you have because the more GB are used on your iPad, the faster the battery will drain.

Reviews.Title: My wife loves it and is showing more interest in trying new things
Reviews.Author: William J. Hampton
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife who has been having more problems with arthritis as she ages and would not come easily to the computer to look at her emails. Now I send them to her iPad and she looks at them in her chair and she is saying she wants to do other computer things with her iPad. I am happy for her and glad to see her showing more interest in keeping up and learning new things.

Reviews.Title: Perfect graduation gift
Reviews.Author: T. Sullivan
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my son for his high school graduation.  I don't think he has put it down yet.  Perfect condition.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Mexicook
Reviews.Content: I finally got an iPad, and I had no idea how cool they are.  The picture is beautiful, and the tablet has endless things to do and loads of applications.  I can't put mine down.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic futuristic product,Does everything i need to do very quickly and to my entire satisfaction
Reviews.Author: Asha Joglekar "sjoglekar"
Reviews.Content: Fantastic futuristic product,Does everything i need to do very quickly and to my entire satisfaction,Retina display gives my movies and home vidoes and photos elite class.Appreciated by my all the relatives..

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Alain Etcheberry
Reviews.Content: I only wish you could expand the memory. I also hate iTunes. I would rather be able to access it as if it were a hard disk (like for most Android tablets.)

Reviews.Title: Good experience thus far.
Reviews.Author: FishDad
Reviews.Content: So far so good. Testing different apps ...Discovering/testing new ones. Enjoying the ipad. The price is still high for me.

Reviews.Title: Love my new ipad
Reviews.Author: stacy
Reviews.Content: This iPad is great! I've had no problems what so ever with it. It's so much easier taking it places instead of lugging my bulky laptop around.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Tony Tschopp "TTschopp"
Reviews.Content: Another outstandingly designed and constructed product from the folks known for their attention to design and construction.  I cannot add anything new to the reviews for this device.  The screen is sharp, the design is solid and it works.

Reviews.Title: Keon's I pad review
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: I pad was everything it was advertised to be, and more. Especially enjoying FaceTime! Also appreciate the ease of downloading apps and e-books.

Reviews.Title: so glad we finally got the ipad with retina display!
Reviews.Author: Jessica Newton
Reviews.Content: So glad we bought this - we got a great deal and have enjoyed having it!  Have a baby due next week and look forward to facetime with relatives who live out of state!

Reviews.Title: Fun and easy to use
Reviews.Author: JH "JH"
Reviews.Content: May be one of the last people to get an iPad.  Love it - does not replace my pc - but love all the apps and screen resolution.

Reviews.Title: Keon's I pad review
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: I pad was everything it was advertised to be, and more. Especially enjoying FaceTime! Also appreciate the ease of downloading apps and e-books.

Reviews.Title: so glad we finally got the ipad with retina display!
Reviews.Author: Jessica Newton
Reviews.Content: So glad we bought this - we got a great deal and have enjoyed having it!  Have a baby due next week and look forward to facetime with relatives who live out of state!

Reviews.Title: Fun and easy to use
Reviews.Author: JH "JH"
Reviews.Content: May be one of the last people to get an iPad.  Love it - does not replace my pc - but love all the apps and screen resolution.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: S. Fan
Reviews.Content: I am using it as notepad for classes, using it as camera a lot, write my stories everywhere I go.

Reviews.Title: Shipped earlier than expected
Reviews.Author: vincent j.
Reviews.Content: I never owned an IPad before but I always wanted before and the sky is the limit and the product is awesome and do want to express the great job on the shipment. Keep up the good work on this amongst other things. Thanks guys.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Tianle Hu
Reviews.Content: No Wifi problem, fast speed,smooth transaction, but don't see big difference from previous iPad 3. Battery certainly not good, usually last 1-2 days.

Reviews.Title: This is it!
Reviews.Author: Dr. S. D
Reviews.Content: I have read many good and bad reviews about this iPad. I decided to buy this iPad for which I have no regret. I have absolutely no problem.  It works excellent. What I like about it is that it is so program that you have no problem getting your way around on it. I will recommend to everyone who has doubt about getting an iPad. Thumbs up!!!!

Reviews.Title: Has worked perfectly since purchase....
Reviews.Author: Gary J "Travel Junkie"
Reviews.Content: There were some negative reviews of this vendor. One particular series of highly critical reviews really made me wonder if I was getting into trouble buying the newest iPAD from this vendor. The price was roughly $120.00 less than Apple's price. So I was apprehensive until the tab arrived. The tab came in unopened original packaging, arriving on time and in good condition. I own two iPad 1s and an iPAD 2, and now this iPAD with retina display. They all work just the way they should. The screen is a nice improvement. This iPAD is so thin that it is easy to misplace if you don't have it in a more bulky case (which I have now done). I am very happy and impressed with both this iPAD model and with the vendor that I purchased it through. Cant complain at all.....

Reviews.Title: sweet
Reviews.Author: Pete
Reviews.Content: amazing just like when i got a new ipad2 except the camera is much better quality and the glass hopefully wont shatter like the ipad2 did

Reviews.Title: It's Great!
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Nill
Reviews.Content: I am a newcomer to iPad.  I have a Nook, and love it, and didn't think I would have any real need or use for an iPad.  However, I am loving it because there are so many more Apps for iPad than for other tablets.  I went with the "lots of memory" one because for the price difference between it and its lesser cousin (64 GB) it is worth going for the one with more memory.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Congratulations! Excelent service!
Reviews.Author: Alessandra Bourguignon Gagno
Reviews.Content: My cousin Luciana, who lives in California, came to Brazil and brought the Ipad to me.I met the site through her and I enjoyed!I indicate.Alessandra

Reviews.Title: Best tablet for me
Reviews.Author: Ben Olberg
Reviews.Content: The price point is the only part that stings, other than that Apple has the best tablets on the market.  Since we already have several apple devices and lots of apps and media purchased through itunes, this tablet made the most sense for our family.  Sharp display, snappy operating system, I'm very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great color
Reviews.Author: Stewart Lewis
Reviews.Content: Great color - quick response. like the camera that goes both ways. screen is very clear. speed is great. love it!

Reviews.Title: I love it, but it's not a replacement for a computer
Reviews.Author: Clint Smith
Reviews.Content: I love this product, but I hate that it does not work with Flash.We bought this thinking we could use this instead of a computer, but it's a hassle not having Microsoft Office. I'd like to be able to plug a stick drive into this, too, but it doesn't have one. Also, it can't hook up to my printer to print things.Well, maybe the iPad could do all these things mentioned above, but I'm not sure how to do it all. Also, i wish i could have multiple apps open at once. Other than that, it is fast, it is easy to use and the display is amazing. It works amazingly with the Apple TV.

Reviews.Title: Love
Reviews.Author: nathaniel house
Reviews.Content: I had been contiplating for a while to get an I pad and I am glad I finally did. Only con I can see is it can't do office docs and you can't access things on flash player. Other than that it is great for browsing and playing.

Reviews.Title: It's an APPLE product
Reviews.Author: Norman C. Bauer "stormincb"
Reviews.Content: I love the iPad, but it sure leaves a lot to imagination when you get it. Almost no written instructions, so you're expected to go on-line for how to use it etc. How do you do that with no help?

Reviews.Title: iPad is great
Reviews.Author: Brian Humphreys
Reviews.Content: This is the 3rd iPad I've owned and it performs much better than previous versions.  The retina display makes reading so much easier on the eyes.  The clarity is remarkable.  The processor also seems to be improved as the transitioning between apps is now quicker.

Reviews.Title: more of the same
Reviews.Author: WxGesr
Reviews.Content: Had Generation 3.  4 is more of the same, but better.  Completely satisfied and recommend the product.  Believe the black is more business like appearing than the white.

Reviews.Title: Love
Reviews.Author: Perrrty lil Princess "perrrtylilprincess"
Reviews.Content: i love my iPad. i would recommend the product to everyone. I am a huge fan of apple products - you should be too!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: christine
Reviews.Content: Best decision I ever made was to purchase this iPad. I got it within one week in impeccable condition. The technology of this iPad and I guess with all apple products is astonishing. This iPad is 100 percent better than those regular tablets by far.

Reviews.Title: Even better than expected
Reviews.Author: B
Reviews.Content: As a previous android user, I was against apple products. BUT I am so very glad I made the switch!!! I couldn't be happier with the IPad and Iphone products. They are very user friendly and super convienent.I purchased the IPad through Amazon and am very very happy about it. It arrived quickly and was packed securely. It is also very easy to set up myself

Reviews.Title: this was nice
Reviews.Author: Betty Aldridge-Brown "B J"
Reviews.Content: I gave my wife my 3rd generation and bought this one. this was a good buy. not to expensive and a very good device. I hope all of you out there can get a deal like I did. contact this company and just maybe. my thank to those that sold it to me

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: CHERI
Reviews.Content: It is fast and I have a lot of space. I have had previous models but lightening is the fastest yet.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Amazing product although I don't know if it is retina display. It works fantastic screen looks great. Pictures look great. I like the apps you can get for free.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Leah
Reviews.Content: I was somewhat skeptical of purchasing this online for my 9 year old son. However it arrived on time and we were all pleased and my son of course was extatic to say the least.I did purchase the square trade protection plan as well.

Reviews.Title: This thing is great...
Reviews.Author: Mark Meeks
Reviews.Content: I have an iPhone that I used to use to play games, but haven't used it for that since getting this.  Great product.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Product, Fast Delivery as always with AMAZON
Reviews.Author: Paula delaPena
Reviews.Content: Very very happy with the product. The ipad4 is an awesome device. My son works for APPLE so it really helps with getting to know all of it's capabilities.

Reviews.Title: I love this product
Reviews.Author: mattelynn renee hardesty
Reviews.Content: Product was in great condition, I use it more than my cellphone and laptop. I Cant put it down <3

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Zip_it
Reviews.Content: So, I didn't think that I would use this much.  I've had a Kindle Fire, but decided to get the iPad and glad I did.  It is just so much easier to use and quick.  Picture is crisp and bright.

Reviews.Title: More than I hoped
Reviews.Author: Reading Angel
Reviews.Content: I have owned an iPad first generation for several years and used it mostly when I traveled. I saw other people using their camera equipped iPads and thought I might like that and the ability to use FaceTime away from home.I was more than pleased with this latest version of Apple's iPad.The display is amazing. I find that I use it all the time, at home as well as away from home.I love doing a back up in the Cloud. The transfer using Cloud from my old to new iPad was effortless. With in a couple of minutes everything I needed, apps, contacts and music was ready to go.

Reviews.Title: great machine
Reviews.Author: Heidi
Reviews.Content: everything about the ipad is wonderful.  it's fast, easy to use and an all around great piece of computing equipment.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Nicholas A Riscinto
Reviews.Content: Bought it as a gift for my wife.  She loves it.  It replaces an I Pad we bought about 4 - 5 years ago.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Kevin C. Holland
Reviews.Content: Awesome device.  Beats any Android tablet hands down.  A good price for an awesome case.  If you need phone protection and it be affordable, this is for you.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Claudia Poleselo
Reviews.Content: The ipad arrived before the expected date. The conditions were great, the product was exactly what I was expecting and it really met all my needs. The only thing is that I wish the ipad 4 was not that heavy, but ok, I'm happy with it anyway.

Reviews.Title: Great Mother's Day Gift
Reviews.Author: Daniel A Brogan
Reviews.Content: Bought version 4 for wife so I could have more access to my version 2. She is loving it, and I am loving getting my iPad 2 back!

Reviews.Title: I am all day with it. And no need any more the note book.
Reviews.Author: Graciela Piñeyrúa
Reviews.Content: My son gift me a tablet one and I loved it and decide to buy a new like this. I always said everybody how happy I am to get it.

Reviews.Title: upgrading from iPad1, this is GREAT!
Reviews.Author: pol
Reviews.Content: love the speed, resolution, feeling when holding, the new connector.I was expecting the device to get uncomfortably hot (as read in some reviews) but it stays really cool with my current usage (browsing, email, youtube, reading).battery life is also exceptional.want the best tablet of the moment? this is it!

Reviews.Title: What is there left to say?
Reviews.Author: J. Hanks
Reviews.Content: This is an iPad.  It works wonderfully as such. It makes for a lousy Android tablet. It has good battery life, but is not a good replacement for batteries generally. The retina display is crisp, but compares unfavorably with a frosty autumn morning. It's too heavy too be a replacement for your kindle, but would be a wonderful alternative to avoid carrying around a complete encyclopedia. If you like Apple products you will love it. However, I do not recommend baking it into a pie.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Katherine E. Cavarretta "k t cav"
Reviews.Content: no issues whatsoever.  I love my iPad!! The seller followed up with me to  make sure I was satisfied with my purchase, and I am very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: MORE THAN SATISFIED
Reviews.Author: Bernard
Reviews.Content: After purchasing this unit. I fell in love with its performance. I ordered headphones, speakers a I TB hard drive storage device and other items.to enhance my experience. I like the mobility of not being confined to a desk. This unit is light nd easy to carry, even with its assessories.

Reviews.Title: i love the ipad
Reviews.Author: kassandra
Reviews.Content: This is a great price for an ipad!! Ipad are always so expensive but this is a good deal for sure.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: tanja H
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet and that's why I wanted to buy the newest version of the iPad. I absolutely love the Retina Display. I was just on vacation at the mountains, and this tablet takes beautiful pictures. I can also have my books and documents with me wherever I go. I absolutely love it!

Reviews.Title: nice quality
Reviews.Author: thomas brace
Reviews.Content: easy to set up and use.  Has great clarity and takes good pictures.  fast internet connections and easy e-mail use.

Reviews.Title: ipad
Reviews.Author: rene
Reviews.Content: nice ipad like yo say brand new  and retina display very fast ipad i very happy with this item tanks

Reviews.Title: Enjoying my iPad
Reviews.Author: Jeanne E. Hoilien
Reviews.Content: Exceeded my expectations and was easy to move through installation steps.  The only thing I did not know is that I can't synch with my ITunes account easily.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Jerry kasner
Reviews.Content: bought as a gift for  my wife. She love it, it was easy to set up and I recommend for anyone to buy this product.

Reviews.Title: iPads RULE!
Reviews.Author: Amy N. Hart "AH"
Reviews.Content: I recommend this to ANY age! You need this. Fast delivery and great protective shipping box. Easy to use and compatible with all other Apple products.

Reviews.Title: IPad is a great tool
Reviews.Author: Gregg Howard
Reviews.Content: Really love this iPad. Fast and easy to use. I use it to stay in touch on Facebook. Works like a charm very easy to type on too !

Reviews.Title: Nice Display
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: I love it so much. The display looks fantastic, and the processing speed is much faster than the old models.

Reviews.Title: I simply love it. The retina display makes everything look sharp and vibrant.
Reviews.Author: C. William Mack "Rent2Own Guy"
Reviews.Content: I haven't owned an iPad before so I can't comment on older models, but just for the beautiful graphics, I would up grade to this  model.

Reviews.Title: Love Our New iPad.
Reviews.Author: Keith Leech
Reviews.Content: Purchased to replace a ASUS TF 101.  The ASUS had become very aggravating, with freezing up, restarts, and inconsistent operation.  The iPad operates pretty much flawlessly.  We are very impressed with it.  This is our first but probably not our last Apple product!

Reviews.Title: Great Apple Product!
Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: You cannot go wrong with an Apple product and the Ipad fits very well with the rest of the Apple line up.

Reviews.Title: Better than eyecandy
Reviews.Author: flyfishernc
Reviews.Content: One more happy IPad owner. It is better than candy! Very thrilled with the sensitive screen touch. It is all good! Came in three days sooner than expected. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Rosemary J. Hasenmiller
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use and has a beautiful display! Going to use it everyday for work and play. Many great apps to download also.

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: T Speldrich
Reviews.Content: I only use Apple products and this one definitely did not disappoint.  Personally, I think Apple's products are very user friendly.  If someone has a question or issue, they can quickly refer to the user guide using iBooks.  Take my iPad with me everywhere!

Reviews.Title: Great iPad at great price!
Reviews.Author: Lee A.
Reviews.Content: Love the product! this is my first Apple product even though I have worked on them over the years. Now is see where the love of these products comes from.I Got a great deal and it came before projected date of delivery. LOVE THAT.

Reviews.Title: I Love It
Reviews.Author: Ed Kramer
Reviews.Content: It wasn't the cheapest price around, but I used American Express points and $200 to purchase my iPad. Now... That's a great bargain. It's everything they said they said about it.  And... It arrived on time.

Reviews.Title: It's what it want
Reviews.Author: Mariana Muñoz Zerbino
Reviews.Content: I love it, it is wonderfull. I can work in my home or any where. It is perfect for mi.

Reviews.Title: Love it can't put it down
Reviews.Author: GOLDCYLON
Reviews.Content: It hard to complain about an IPAD. It's form and function are wonderful and the battery life is spectacular. Love it can't think of owning any other tablet

Reviews.Title: Excellent product! Very easy to use and a true joy not to carry a laptop arround.
Reviews.Author: Stephen P Carney
Reviews.Content: Easy to purchase easy to use. It is the bridge between the small screen of the iphone and the bulk of a laptop.We should have done it sooner!

Reviews.Title: Excellent product! Very easy to use and a true joy not to carry a laptop arround.
Reviews.Author: Stephen P Carney
Reviews.Content: Easy to purchase easy to use. It is the bridge between the small screen of the iphone and the bulk of a laptop.We should have done it sooner!

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: RA
Reviews.Content: Great buy, product arrived as promised am very pleased and would buy again.Very good experience. This was a purchase for my wife's birthday and she is very happy..

Reviews.Title: Fantrastic iPad
Reviews.Author: Dee Dee
Reviews.Content: Fantrastic...fast shipping (within 4 days).  Other than the battery getting low very quickly (every couple of days), which really doesn't bother me.  I really do love it and highly recoommend it.

Reviews.Title: It is iPad, what else?
Reviews.Author: Lidia
Reviews.Content: How to rate an iPad? It has disadvantages, but ore advantages from my point of view. I tried another tablet before, which was broken 3 days after purchasing. Since then, I have it clear, there is no better tablet in the market right now, from the HW point of view. I missed the simplicity of using Android, above all everything related to files management (I do not like iTunes)

Reviews.Title: very happy
Reviews.Author: sandra
Reviews.Content: I love this I can do so much on it  , it is unbelievable ,  I even brought my daughter one  , so she would stop using mine

Reviews.Title: First Mac Purchasse
Reviews.Author: J. Ray "Searcher1"
Reviews.Content: My first Mac purchase was this IPad and so far it's been great. No problems with setup but am still learing all the ins and outs. Haven't explored all the possibilities of it yet but soon.

Reviews.Title: Why did I wait so long!
Reviews.Author: Janice L. Fratus
Reviews.Content: Basically, it was due to doing lots of research, which really paid off.So happy and love the ease of all of the features.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Anne Q.
Reviews.Content: always happy with apple products...look forward to seeing what's next...keep up the good work! That's about all I have to say about that...

Reviews.Title: works great.
Reviews.Author: Abigail J McGee
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my product.No dents or dings in casing. The screen is great an clean. All spotless. Came in original case. Works great and am very impressed with product.Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Today's Technology
Reviews.Author: Harley
Reviews.Content: I'm new to technology, but this old fogey is learning!  I will like it, however, and since I used my credit cards perks for it, so much the better!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Charlotte K. Pule
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my I-Pad 4 th Generation. Ordering from Amazon was easy, safe website, got my item on the date as expected! I would recommend to anyone to order from Amazon because you will be in good hands. THank you and that is why I rated it 5 stars!

Reviews.Title: Loving it
Reviews.Author: Fonda Whitefield
Reviews.Content: Like it much better than my hp touchpad.  And it is fast but it still cannot replace my desktop unfortunately

Reviews.Title: Fabulous!
Reviews.Author: E. Waters "e"
Reviews.Content: I received this as a graduation gift. It's a good thing I didn't have it before I finished school...I would have NEVER gotten anything done!

Reviews.Title: It's an Ipad
Reviews.Author: E. Reister
Reviews.Content: Exactly as promised. I am a 1st time Ipad owner. This tablet is amazing. Fantastic graphics and loads of apps. I can't compare it to other versions, but this one is great. I am an Android fan and debated for months which system to buy. The Ipad is worth the price.

Reviews.Title: best tablet ever
Reviews.Author: Dionte S.
Reviews.Content: The ipad is amazing and its compatibility with my iphone and the use of icloud is great.  I would highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: The only tablet to buy
Reviews.Author: Ursula L. Palladino
Reviews.Content: What's there to say? It's an iPad. The best tablet to buy period. Even if you're a PC lover, this thing is impossible to put down.

Reviews.Title: I pad tablet
Reviews.Author: steve zippro
Reviews.Content: I am very happy and excited with this purchase, I really enjoy using this item and do almost on a daily basis. The only issue is that I need more memory to store videos and pictures on it, but I have options to take care of that problem by storing software on my computer and laptop so I only keep the most recent items stored on my iPad. Over all it's a great product and really, really enjoy having it.

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Miguel Angel Jimenez
Reviews.Content: The best tablet in the WorldFasterBeutifullClearGood priceQualityI prefer this tabletMy family is happy with that

Reviews.Title: Love love love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: Doreen Pigliavento
Reviews.Content: It does everything that I need. Also it takes great pictures, love the face time to keep in touch with family.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Laura M. Combs
Reviews.Content: The new Apple iPad 5 does exactly what I needed a tablet to do. Very fast, vivid colors, looks great. Very happy.

Reviews.Title: Way cool
Reviews.Author: A. K. Zambeck "eye2"
Reviews.Content: I haven't used it.  It was a present for my 7 year old daughter.  She digs it and has become an expert with it.  She's downloaded a lot of free and has a great time.  She even put Skype on it and video chats with grandma and grandpa in Japan.  She can walk around with it and show them what everybody is doing.The only drawback is that she's figured out how to connect to NetFlix.  Now, My Little Pony music can be heard all over the house.  On the up side, the ending theme song for My Little Pony in Japan is done by HKT48 so that is really cool.

Reviews.Title: Really love it!
Reviews.Author: Barry Fence
Reviews.Content: I bought this device *cough* used about 3 months ago. There isn't a single day when it hasn't had use, including a trip to New York and Boston. My previous tablet was the original ASUS Transformer which had started to languish in the corner of my office because of its lack of screen responsiveness.The advantages of the ASUS over the Ipad is the openness of the file system. That's my only gripe with the Ipad (not jailbroken), is that you can't just store files on the device without the use of a specific program. (Ipad users will know what I mean.)The battery life on the Ipad is pretty impressive. With my ASUS, I would have to charge it almost every night, but the Ipad just keeps going and going. That battery capacity comes with a price, much longer charging times.Otherwise, a really amazing device that appeals to all ages.

Reviews.Title: IPAD!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Justified40cal
Reviews.Content: The packaging was very poor for my purchase, but luckily it was in good condition when I picked it up.  The Ipad is awesome and operates very well.  The battery life and charging would be the only thing I would complain about.  Its not to bad on battery life, but recharging takes 5 hours for a full charge.

Reviews.Title: my wife loves it
Reviews.Author: stargazer423
Reviews.Content: I got this for my wife for her birthday and she absolutely loves it.  She has an iphone and a kindle hd, but likes the ipad much more.

Reviews.Title: Loved It!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jonathan
Reviews.Content: It is awesome!!! The most fun and use I have ever gotten out of a product. If you are getting this product just for school, get a laptop. Although it is devise that is awesome for the go, it will not replace the functionality of a laptop. On the other hand, if you are looking for something to take notes on, serf the web, watch movies, and do some minor projects on, it is a can't miss.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Jose F. Cuesta "sun_moon_yoga"
Reviews.Content: Neat, resolution is great and the speed is fantastic. First tablet and so far so good. If it had office app available I would not use my PC anymore.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Dianne Ford
Reviews.Content: Still experimenting with all the features, but so far I love it!  I really got this for my husband, but he lets me use it too!

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 4 w/ retina display
Reviews.Author: LJP
Reviews.Content: This is my first iPad. I use an android smartphone, so you can say Apple products are new and "fresh" to me ! I learned quite a lot on how to use my iPad, my  17 year old daughter helped me too. I absolutely love my iPad and am amazed by how much I can do with it.  I will never be without one from here on. Great product.  The Apple company is fantastic, great apps too !

Reviews.Title: Fabulous
Reviews.Author: Dorothy M. Larimore "dynamite duck"
Reviews.Content: After careful deliberation and investigation we felt that the Apple iPad with Retina Display 64 GB would meet all of our needs.  We will link it to an aviation program as is done in cockpits of airliners.  Couldn't be happier with it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: I was a little hesitant, not sure if i really NEEDED it, but i love it.  Turns out i didn't really NEED it after buying a laptop, but i wouldnt give it up.  Its so much nicer to goof around on than my phone.  I rarely use my phone to browse on now unless i am away from home.  It seems so small and cumbersome now that i have the iPad.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous
Reviews.Author: Dorothy M. Larimore "dynamite duck"
Reviews.Content: After careful deliberation and investigation we felt that the Apple iPad with Retina Display 64 GB would meet all of our needs.  We will link it to an aviation program as is done in cockpits of airliners.  Couldn't be happier with it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: I was a little hesitant, not sure if i really NEEDED it, but i love it.  Turns out i didn't really NEED it after buying a laptop, but i wouldnt give it up.  Its so much nicer to goof around on than my phone.  I rarely use my phone to browse on now unless i am away from home.  It seems so small and cumbersome now that i have the iPad.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use with wonderful the best of all the tablets
Reviews.Author: Craig Getzlaff
Reviews.Content: The Apple iPad is very easy to use and carry around with you. It has a wonderful display / touch screen. You can also access a ton of Music and Apps. Many of these Apps are wonderful and free, or wonderful and inexpensive. Even if you have only used PCs all your life, like myself, you will still find the iPad to be the best of all the tablets.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: James F Ryan
Reviews.Content: order was filled in timely manner and my questions answered prompty. new tech was what i wanted and thats what i got.still learning new operating system but happy to avoid latest windows system.

Reviews.Title: Like it
Reviews.Author: Brian McNeill
Reviews.Content: I use this for flying for charts in flight weather, moving map and every thing a pilot would need.The screen handles the sun very well and I have never not been able to see it.

Reviews.Title: My first tablet ever
Reviews.Author: Richard Le
Reviews.Content: I finally own a tablet and I absolutely love it. The design and quality shows why apple is on top of the tablet game.

Reviews.Title: As good as they describe!
Reviews.Author: Richard M. Miller
Reviews.Content: Perfect tablet. Yes it is pricey but the retina display is fantastic.Useful for a bunch of things...no need to bring a laptop anymore. I highly recommend the most memory you can afford though - especially if you use it for photography business.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Uscdld
Reviews.Content: This product was everything we'd though it would be and more. I'm not a huge Apple geek like some so I couldn't really tell you the difference between this version of iPad and the prior versions, but the screen is clear and it processes quickly. It was a good purchase.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Warren
Reviews.Content: I use it mostly as a book and for email. My husband bought a Kindle fire 8.9 after getting the ipad for me. He likes the Kindle because it's more like a computer. The apple has nicer apps tho.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Display and Typical IPAD Functions
Reviews.Author: gsardener
Reviews.Content: The retina display is excellent.  Photo displays are very high quality.  All the rest of the functions are typical for the IPAD tablets.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!
Reviews.Author: Brandon Thompson
Reviews.Content: I was little worried about purchasing this item on Amazon. However, once I was assured that this product is just like purchasing one from the Apple Store and the price is amazing not to mention the endless accessories; I am glad with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Amazing display!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "xXS1taXx"
Reviews.Content: As a first time Apple user I absolutely love this product. Great retina display, easy to use, etc. would highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Smart4987
Reviews.Content: Great price and great find...works perfectly. I would recommend this product. I am wondering how I ever lived without it!

Reviews.Title: Can't believe I waited so long to purchase this because it's awesome
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth A. Martin "Beths Red Shoes"
Reviews.Content: functional, useable, & already something I can't do without.  LOVE IT!  Glad I bought the larger, 64GB model with Retina Display.

Reviews.Title: like it
Reviews.Author: Sérgio
Reviews.Content: i like it this product, i'll go to use this product and i think is very good for my familly

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Dex0269
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my wife and now I'm ready to get me one.Don't know how we have gone so long without one.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad
Reviews.Author: Carol A Bender
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my ipad and plan to keep on enjoying forsome time to come. I wasn't totally thrilled with the supplier butthe product itself is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: I Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Susan Page
Reviews.Content: It is even better than I anticipated. My favorite apps work great, "the Blaze", Pinterest and video podcasts. Very user friendly.

Reviews.Title: Perfect condition
Reviews.Author: Jimmmy
Reviews.Content: The iPad 4 with retina display is stunning to watch, the picture quality is better than expected. The seller sold it as in brand new condition and I couldn't tell that it was ever opened. The packaging and shipping were great and very quick.

Reviews.Title: My new iPad
Reviews.Author: Van
Reviews.Content: It's everything I expected and then some. I recommend it highly. I hardly ever use my laptop anymore since it's so portable I always carry it with me.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Lenore Prelutsky
Reviews.Content: I am really enjoying my iPad  there is a lot i need to learn  It is great and I am looking forward to learn a lot

Reviews.Title: Still the best tablet
Reviews.Author: ASL
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a replacement for the 2 year old original iPad and looked at a number of Android tablets as well as Windows 8 tablets. In the end decided to go with iPad 4 and feel it was a good decision. The screen is amazing, the overall experience with the device is much improved compared to the original iPad. Transferring content and apps from the old device to the new one was painless, everything transferred perfectly except for one odd weather app which had to be reinstalled.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Orlando Gibson
Reviews.Content: Works good like expected and at a very good price. bought it as a graduation price and scored a hit

Reviews.Title: Love
Reviews.Author: Ashley A Rothermel
Reviews.Content: I am so happy with my iPad! I love everything about it!  It came sooner then I thought it would and was very happy with the sender! Thanks again!

Reviews.Title: Good product but no WOW affect
Reviews.Author: color me satisfied
Reviews.Content: Surprised at my expected response from this product.  Sometimes when I swipe on the lower part of the screen the pages do not advance, I have to move slightly higher to get the pages to turn.  I expected more i guess.

Reviews.Title: Yes Love is the word :)
Reviews.Author: waldo
Reviews.Content: This 128GB iPad has been totally enjoyed by my son, I gave it to him because he would use my corporate iPad endlessly and you know  I needed it too.My son is autistic and this device keeps him focused and gaming for now.There are apps for speech games that I will load for him as we go forward.I would recommend this iPad to all people of earth.Thank You

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad with Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Peter Trevor Lamontagne
Reviews.Content: I did not have tothink too much about this.  I got an iPad six months ago and my wife wanted a similar one.  Wish I couldhave kept this newer version.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: Fast, simple and efficient. This is the perfect gadget, the retina display is amazing and the battery is the best.

Reviews.Title: High Quality IPad
Reviews.Author: Kcsrider "Kcsrider"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this IPad to give to my wife as a gift a year ago.  She uses it endlessly for anything and everything.  Her laptop gets very little use anymore.  The screen is a bit fragile, and Apple wants an arm and a leg to replace the glass if it breaks.  A high quality case is a wise investment, not only for ease of use, but for protection from breakage.  These things are expensive, but well worth the money if you use a computer much or require portability.  No more laptops on vacation!

Reviews.Title: Best yet!
Reviews.Author: Susie "Proof Reader Wannabe"
Reviews.Content: I had the iPad 2 and loved it but I quickly ran out of room with only 64GB between my music, movies and books after 2 years. But I did not want a smaller screen. So, the iPad 4 meets my needs perfectly. I am not a gamer, so not having Flash really is no big deal. Love that Siri is included with this version. No more typing emails! With the addition of Apple TV I can watch movies on the iPad or TV. Just wish Apple and Amazon would share their respective Gateways on both Apple TV and Roku. I could not afford both and would love to be able to use Amazon Video player on my TV without the need for extra accessories.

Reviews.Title: Speechless ....
Reviews.Author: utkarsh shah
Reviews.Content: What can you say about the apple retina display,,??awesomesttt...thats it..Its a product that you have desired in a tablet..I guess it is more than that...thank you jobs....

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Fernando
Reviews.Content: Excellet purchase, I received it in the correct time without problems and works perfectly. Apple always in the first places

Reviews.Title: I do not know why I waited so long
Reviews.Author: AWE
Reviews.Content: I should have bought a pad along time ago. I have no regrets whatever.  The only problem is it might make me lazy. Instead of going to the computer desk, I now read my daily newspapers in bed, with larger fonts. Excellent purchase. I loved the 4pics1word game. I did all. I can go on and on with praises. Thank you Apple.

Reviews.Title: IPAD 32 GB
Reviews.Author: guadalupe hernandez
Reviews.Content: Awesome purchase!  Just what we were seeking in an IPAD at a very good price. Was easy and a pleasure doing business with this seller. We are thoroughly enjoying our new IPAD and intend to purchase another.  32GB is perfect for our intended use.

Reviews.Title: Apple Ipad
Reviews.Author: Dana G. Boyd
Reviews.Content: My Grandaughter was very pleased with it.  She said I had made her day.  Thank You, Dana Boyd.  I will be needing another in about a year for my grandson.

Reviews.Title: As expected
Reviews.Author: Gary Spiker
Reviews.Content: Completely recommended.  The quality of the retina display is second to none.  Battery life lasts all day.  So many apps to keep me busy.

Reviews.Title: Happy, Happy Happy it looks great
Reviews.Author: Larry K DeBlieux
Reviews.Content: Had a iPad first generation and there is no comparison to this one.  Great product from Apple and would recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: one of the best purchases ive made
Reviews.Author: Vironka Davis
Reviews.Content: i'm a post graduate student and bought this ipad for school. it is a great educational tool and is worth every penny. i havent had any problems at all with my ipad from this seller. im not an apple geek and this is my only apple product, but i couldn't be happier with it. its great to be able to take notes and highlight on my textbook and class notes right on the ipad and have less to carry around.

Reviews.Title: I had no Internet connection problems at all
Reviews.Author: sumrsolo
Reviews.Content: The seller was great and this arrived 3 days earlier than what was expected! I love it and it came in excellent condition. I don't know what a lot of people are talking about this iPad 4 having problems connecting to their wireless Internet and crashing a lot. This hasn't happened to me once yet and I'm not saying it hasn't happened to them but it is probably their internet's fault and not the device's fault because I have like the cheapest Internet and the cheapest Internet router but mine connects fine and hasn't crashed once. So that should tell you something. This is my first iPad and the only thing I will complain about is the battery life. It is terrible but then again I'm on mine a lot since I need it so much with making YouTube videos and doing my other work on it like my poetry. This is my only computer so I rely on it a ton. It is reliable in everything else though so I just suggest that you keep a wall adapter and charger handy wherever you are.

Reviews.Title: iPad 3
Reviews.Author: Johan Marquez
Reviews.Content: iPad 3Cumplió con lo indicado en lo oferta.Excelente producto lo recomiendo, vendedor serió. Me gusto la rapidez.Saludos.

Reviews.Title: one of the best purchases ive made

Reviews.Content: i'm a post graduate student and bought this ipad for school. it is a great educational tool and is worth every penny. i havent had any problems at all with my ipad from this seller. im not an apple geek and this is my only apple product, but i couldn't be happier with it. its great to be able to take notes and highlight on my textbook and class notes right on the ipad and have less to carry around.

Reviews.Title: Perfect and nice
Reviews.Author: Cláudia Carvalho
Reviews.Content: Easy to handle. Good price. Fast. I cannot compare with the others models because this is my first but de screen definition is good.

Reviews.Title: loving my new ipad 4th gen 64GB White:)
Reviews.Author: NF
Reviews.Content: For those that don't know: microsoft Word, Excel, Powerpoint, etc. are all avaiable for FREE at the apple App Store. The name of the program is OnLive Desktop. I can now leave my netbook at home and bring my ipad to my university to take notes!This iPad 4th gen 64GB White is beautiful. Came with iOS 6.0 and I jailbroke it within minutes with evasi0n!I just ordered the best cover ever: Snugg iPad 4 & iPad 3 Case - Leather Case Cover and Flip Stand with Elastic Hand Strap and Premium Nubuck Fibre Interior (White) - Automatically Wakes and Puts the iPad 4 & 3 to Sleep. Superior Quality Design as Featured in GQ Magazine in White and a great bluetooth keyboard: Anker® Ultra Slim Mini Bluetooth 3.0 Wireless Keyboard for iPad Mini / iPad / Nexus 7 / Galaxy Tab and other Tablets - White.Very happy purhases :).

Reviews.Title: Finally Gave In and Bought an iPad!
Reviews.Author: Finland421
Reviews.Content: I am so glad I finally gave into the urge to buy an iPad.  I love the display quality, camera, sound and iCloud functions that sync to my iPhone and Mac.  I still have a lot to learn, but really like it so far.  I bought the Logitech Ultrathin Keyboard cover and love it also.  I'm a keyboard fan and don't mind a compact feel.  I carry them nicely in a Vera Bradley tablet sleeve.  Excellent purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great product.  Apple did it again.
Reviews.Author: Renae Dunbar
Reviews.Content: love, love, love it.  Am purchasing another for my other daughter and probably one for me in the near future.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: armchaircowgirl
Reviews.Content: What's not to like about an iPad? So much more convenient than booting up my laptop to check email, and lots of games and other apps. Loving it!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: NCW
Reviews.Content: I Love this Product!1. Perfect 'retina' display2. Ease of use3. 'Minimalistic' design ("Apple" trademark)4. I use it to as an alternative medium to surf internet, read pdf files, etc, etc, when I develop strains from sitting too long in front of my desktop..:)

Reviews.Title: Ipad 4
Reviews.Author: M. Klinker
Reviews.Content: had purchased a kindle fire hd 8.9 because of the good ratings and it was about 200 less than the ipad each with the 32G memory.  I used it for about 2 weeks.  I found it not as intuitive and the learning curve, while not bad, was a bit more cumbersome to learn to use.  Also it was one more operating system I would have to understand and use. I have an iphone 5, which replace my 4.  The iphone is easy to use, all kinds of apps (though I dont use many, its nice to know they are available).  I have handle the ipad before from relatives etc and they seemed nice and all, but not much different  from the iphone and wondered why the fuss.  At the time, I just couldnt see spending the bigger bucks for the iPad.  I found out differently.  While the Kindle does everything it says it does,  I returned it and ordered this ipad.  I feel now that it is definitely worth the extra.  It has the same sharp image with the retina display as the kindle and I would say even better.  Since I travel a lot and have satelite for TV at home, I use a vulkano (like sling box) to view my DVR recordings and live tv stations from home.  The Kindle did an OK job, but the iPad is superior with that task.  the app for kindle worked, had to pay extra for it and the operating system handled it OK but every 30 to 40 minutes it would drop the connection.  The ipad app was free and rock solid, so far.  I had used the iphone for several years, and using the iPad is as comfortable with familiar icons and function.  It has a little larger screen, ease of use, more apps, and accessories than kindle which made me spring for the extra dollars.  I am very happy with my decision.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Nikki
Reviews.Content: This is probably one of the best products I've ever bought. I wanted something that was lightweight and portable, and would replace my bulky laptop. This definitely is that. I was a little worried about having to pay for the apps, but there are tons of free ones out there. The only con i have is the keyboard. It's very tedious. If they put a regular keyboard on it, though, it wouldn't be the same product.  I would buy another one in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Amos Amodu
Reviews.Content: I love it. It is fast and meets my computing needs for now, especially pictures and graphics.I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Ahead of time
Reviews.Author: tom ash jr
Reviews.Content: Was exactly what my wife wanted.  Got the iPad ahead of the projected arrival date which after my last experience was great.

Reviews.Title: Apple Ipad
Reviews.Author: AME
Reviews.Content: it's great, i love it. i take it every where i go.  keeps me busy. i can check my e-mail, facebook, or account.

Reviews.Title: Great!!
Reviews.Author: Edward L. POling
Reviews.Content: Better than my old iPad one!  Love this beach to text features! They really make it easy to journal! Also like the quick Gestures!

Reviews.Title: This is a great product!
Reviews.Author: LeRoy Garcia
Reviews.Content: L love my iPad 4.  Its quite handy especially when pared with a cover & keyboard, just like a laptop

Reviews.Title: It is so fast!!!  Great Vendor delivery
Reviews.Author: Jennifer N. Johnson "Jena1"
Reviews.Content: I love my Apple IPAD with 32G, It is very simple to set up and sync's  with my Mac Book.  I am satisfied the with IPAD  and glad I did not choose a less expensive tablet..I am still exploring the features and so far happy and satisfied..This tablet arrived quickly and packaged properly.

Reviews.Title: Awesome device for senior parents
Reviews.Author: Allen K. Steele
Reviews.Content: Purchased and gifted to my parents. They love it! My Dad uses it to watch a Netflix movie and to keep up with what is going on in the world, subscribing to newspaper and magazines. Easy to use and a powerful way to stay in touch with grand children using Skype video chat.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it!! My new toy.
Reviews.Author: Nilda Vergara
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this product.  Received as a Christmas gift from my boss, love her.  Use it everyday for surfing the web ~ shopping;  email and facebook.....just absolutely love it!!!!

Reviews.Title: iPad Review
Reviews.Author: Janie Forsythe
Reviews.Content: I love it!! Retina Display makes everything so crystal clear and sharp.  Have truly enjoyed the user friendliness of getting around in the iPad and exploring its options.

Reviews.Title: Totally Awesome
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: I just love my Ipad 4 64 GB I am so addicted to it, I use it all the time I recently returned it for the wifi with AT&T; so I can have internet access 24/7 no matter where I am whether it's in the car at the park or in a location that is not wifi ready. I love the games I love looking up different things on the internet.  I went two whole weeks without watching tv because the tablet itself is soo entertaining.  I bought books to read on it movies and the clarity of the pictures are awesome I took pictures at my brothers wedding and it came out gorgeous people were saying instead of hiring a photographer they could have hired me. I downloaded some app that frame the pictures and decorated it very nicely.  I just love it. This is my very first tablet and I love it, this is a must have.  I also bought the office word app so I can type, I just have to get my air printer and Im all set don't even use my laptop anymore.

Reviews.Title: This iPad is everything I wanted in a tablet - I hardly use my laptop now!
Reviews.Author: juanita beatty
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this iPad to everyone - you won't regret purchasing the best tablet on the market at all!

Reviews.Title: I just love my Ipad
Reviews.Author: Jean Francois Regnard
Reviews.Content: So easy to use. So easy to start using. So fast. So powerful. Such a beautiful object. I hesitated between the Ipad and the Surface (which is probably very good). Yet, I have no intention to have any regret....

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad w/Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Yooper Red Hatter
Reviews.Content: When I ordered it at midnight Sunday night, I had doubts it would arrive today, March 13, well it did! I have an iPhone so I'm finding it very user friendly! So far: AWESOME!  (I'm still learning & trying different app's!) Thanks Amazon, you still amaze me!

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Zoe Covenant Stores
Reviews.Content: The retina display is an added plus. It just makes all your viewing enjoyable.For the video recording, appears to me the resolution below what I expected,or am I missing something?Do I have to change some settings? Overall great product!

Reviews.Title: its great!
Reviews.Author: PB
Reviews.Content: This model shows more capability than the last version which i also have.  love the color...speed and camera.  may get another one later this year.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: C. Misra
Reviews.Content: Superb in every respect.  Best thing I ever brought.  Sold my iPod touch 5g and Sony 42 inch led tv to justify cost and feel I came out ahead.  I like this thing a lot.  Had it a month now.  Likin it more than ever.  Once you go Retina, you can Never go back.  Far as I am concerned, my laptop can sit in that pawnshop til it rots away to nothing.  I'm not sure i can or will eer back to that hunk of garbage.  A 350 dollar hp I bought brand new in auGust 2011, and eighteen months later, one hour of use and it gets hot enough to fry bacon on.  Piece of junk.  Ad I believe it's truly the only time in life I had a problem with electronic item.  Cuz I don't use them too much.  Te ipad has been awesome.

Reviews.Title: Best Tablet
Reviews.Author: dlb "blue"
Reviews.Content: We have a fleet of devices, tablets included. The kids need the iPad for school. My husband bought me the new iPad 4, 4th generation with the fastest chip. We have the other brands of tablets in our home too for all of the kids as well as for the 3 of us, my elderly aunt included, so you can choose almost any brand of tablet or device to use. The iPad 4, the only one that is the 4th generation is in constant demand over all of the others, iPads except for the iPad mini, the others,  Samsung is the least popular, the Nexus they will use  and there is another brand I won't name. LOLThe iPad 4 is so fast, remarkably so, the Retina Display is simply picture perfect, the colors do not overwhelm like other brands to with their overly saturated colors. The wifi has the best connection I've had on a mobile device. The App Store makes it even nicer with the wealth of full sized tablet Apps, not stretched out phone apps, along with the ability to watch your movies, listen to your music and use 3rd party apps to access all of your Amazon content. It has Netflix, the Kindle App, Video App from Amazon, so much. I can't find anything to complain about and I don't have anything that I can't find on here to use for fun or for work.It's an A++++++choice for us and the best out there at this time I feelOh Itunes U is a phenomenal addition to any iPad

Reviews.Title: Great iPad...
Reviews.Author: Luanne King "kingscorner"
Reviews.Content: This is my second iPad and now both my husband and I have one.  Love the retina display and would recommend this product to anyone for ease of use.

Reviews.Title: Excellent iPad
Reviews.Author: H. Wesley
Reviews.Content: Fully loaded, this device is much better than the iPad 1.  I am looking forward to seeing more accessories for it.

Reviews.Title: Just Awesome!
Reviews.Author: JOHN
Reviews.Content: My first Apple product. Does everything you want it to. Runs fast and easy to operate. I have had it for a month. Plays movies perfect. Resolution is awesome. Would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet ever
Reviews.Author: fernando Fuenmayor "nando"
Reviews.Content: Don't buy anything else, a bunch of apps and good games and free most of then, buy it over 32gb

Reviews.Title: Very Useful
Reviews.Author: Rick Fryan
Reviews.Content: This is a great Tool for me and my Business.  I like it for reading Books as well - The Battery Life is AWESOME!!!

Reviews.Title: Love this IPAD
Reviews.Author: Joanne
Reviews.Content: I had an Android tablet which worked well for me but the battery died after just 16 months.  Figured I would pay the price and try the IPAD.  The display is sharper.  Love the extra features.  I didn't expect to see such a difference.  If the battery holds up, (I have only used this for a couple nows) I expect that I will not go back to the Android tablet.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad with Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Cathy J. Hauptly "Cathy"
Reviews.Content: I am extremely happy with the product and the service.  It is exactly as described and I was very impressed with the service as well.  Would definitely do business with them again.

Reviews.Title: Latest Apple tablet--enough said.
Reviews.Author: Roy, Sr.
Reviews.Content: I really like this tablet and am very glad I waited to by it until several generations were available to learn from.  32 GB is VERY sufficent for me for both personal and business uses.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: GUANGBO XIE
Reviews.Content: I have received my new apple ipad with retina display (16G) this morning. sealed very well, it's a new one. I have played with it for about one hour, very good.

Reviews.Title: Excelente herramienta
Reviews.Author: Daniel Camacho
Reviews.Content: El producto es una excelente herramienta diseñada para facilitarle la vida al consumidor, logrando converger hobbies, aministración de correos y redes sociales, todo en uno.

Reviews.Title: excelente producto

Reviews.Content: 100% recomendado excelente producto, no tengo queja alguna en lo absoluto, muchas gracias por todo, estar pendiente para ofertar proximos productos de ustedes saludos

Reviews.Content: I love the sharpness of the I-Pad but have yet to find what it can do.  I'm having fun playing with it but need to learn much more.
