Reviews.Content: I love the sharpness of the I-Pad but have yet to find what it can do.  I'm having fun playing with it but need to learn much more.

Reviews.Title: Love the new iPad 4!
Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: Bought one for myself and one for my husband, got them yesterday and setup was super easy.We're both first time tablet and apple users, so still getting used to not being on a laptop for everything.No complaints from us and we anticipate it's going to be awesome as everyone says.Will update later on

Reviews.Title: so glad i waited till now... this device is flawless
Reviews.Author: Sean Maytum "Think different use a Hackintosh"
Reviews.Content: I didn't really want to fall into the apple hype and get the latest, greatest device. but i had seen some amazing demonstrations of what this device can do for both controlling music daws(digital audio workstations) and draw/painting aps with a proper stylus. So i took the plunge. I was not disappointed, but what really amazed me was amazing the web(facebook, internet reading etc...) look on this device. it is crystal clear and so much easier on the eye than my laptop or iphone. it's literally the perfect size. photos look exactly like what they are supposed to look like. I also love this model as it's the "budget" model with the smallest hard drive and no phone service. i just hook it up to wifi and i'm set. Also i don't need a lot hard drive space as i'm not really storing anything on it, just accessing the web.

Reviews.Title: Ipad With Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Jose Alejandro Salazar Salazar
Reviews.Content: Excelente.. Muy buena el Ipad.. Mejor nitidez, mas rapida, muchas mejoras en el iOS 6.. Lo unico es que se calienta un poco mas que el Ipad 2.

Reviews.Title: Quality Tablet
Reviews.Author: Frank C.
Reviews.Content: I love the Android environment but the ipad is still the best tablet you can buy.  ios feels a bit boring and outdated but everything runs so smoothly. Retina display is gorgeous and online browsing with Safari is just the best. And of course the thousands of apps available are a pleasure to use on this tablet.  The build quality of the hardware is unmatched.  There's nothing plasticky about this tablet.  It's just plain solid.  Well worth the $499 I spent on the 16 gb version.

Reviews.Title: IPad Retina Display
Reviews.Author: D. HOFER "Barb"
Reviews.Content: This is my first iPad but not my first electronic device. I am enjoying it immensely! It is a little bit of a leaning curve, as I am a long time MS user. But it's coming along and I am enjoying my "new toy".

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: I wanted something to surf the web and play games and doing other things and not carry around a big lap top so I bought this and  love the iPad. I have nothing bad to say about the iPad,  even actually found a word document that lets me type papers up for school.

Reviews.Title: A+++++
Reviews.Author: KLM
Reviews.Content: I love this product.  This is my first Apple device and I have found it easy to use and very useful.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Victoria A. Wilson
Reviews.Content: The only problem I have is connecting to an outside WiFi.  It is great at home, but, at the office where we have WiFi, that network doesn't show up.  One of the reasons I got it was for a trip I am taking this summer.  I thought I could use it for maping, getting my email etc. and now I am not certain if it will work for that.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I love this iPad it works really well and I can store everything I need on it. It picked up my wi-fi really fast and even attached to the keyboard I bought for it with no problem.

Reviews.Title: Can't live without this now!
Reviews.Author: Sabra Beatty
Reviews.Content: Love my iPad! Probably too much--it's pretty addicting. No negatives that I can think of, except I'm usually on the iPad when I should be doing other things :-(

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: BJ
Reviews.Content: Love it! It's everything I need and want in an iPad. Definitely buy one with your chosen carrier to save you time and effort later.

Reviews.Title: HAPPY AS A PIG IN THE SUNSHINE
Reviews.Author: DR T
Reviews.Content: THIS IPAD IS EVERYTHING PROMISED IN THE LITERATURE AND IN REVIEWS.  I ESPECIALLY LIKE THE CLARITY OF THE PICTURE AND THE SPEED WHICH THE IPAD MOVES FROM THE VARIOUS SITES.  THE BATTERY LIFE IS OUTSTANDING.  RECOMMEND BUYERS SELECT WITH CARE THE CHOICE OF INEXPENSIVE SCREEN COVERS TO PROTECT.  SOME BRANDS APPLY MUCH MORE EASILY.  ASK FRIENDS FOR ADVICE.

Reviews.Title: Great upgrade from Ipad 2
Reviews.Author: Bobbyinbristol
Reviews.Content: Purchased the Ipad. 4 to enjoy the retina display and Siri. Absolutely love it..Picture and graphics are incredible and wifi speeds are even better than the ipad. 2. Don't get me wrong, I still love my ipad 2 but have demoted it to the bedroom ..lol.. Transferring all data and apps from 2 to 4 was a snap using the cloud method. Would highly recommend this to anyone .

Reviews.Title: very very perfect products
Reviews.Author: Nikita  krivyikh
Reviews.Content: We are longly this is device!!! And what he going with you.Very big think you)))))Very class products!!! Say

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: bill s.
Reviews.Content: it does every thing i thought it would. mnow my wife and i can both be doing something on the internet at da same time.also picture taking is easy and pictures look great . i have reccomened this to everyone in my circle of friends.

Reviews.Title: the best product
Reviews.Author: Mindy
Reviews.Content: Brand new sealed in box. i cant put it down.  Fast delivery, cant go wrong in puchasing an ipad its worth the money.

Reviews.Title: A gift for my sister!
Reviews.Author: Warlito
Reviews.Content: I usually go online for shopping and i ran into this beautiful Newest IPAD which is cheap and made my sister happy. All in all I like the product and I will sure shop on this seller again. Very Accurate description.

Reviews.Title: Great love it!
Reviews.Author: Jedi master "j"
Reviews.Content: Great deal on this one of a kind technological marvel, how things change so quick. I and my family hardly use the computer anymore after getting this. Great is all I can say!

Reviews.Title: I love my iPad
Reviews.Author: Nelxon "artist, animator, programmer, game de...
Reviews.Content: No point in me writing a long review, I love my iPad: I'm writing this review with it right now...

Reviews.Title: Why we like the iPad
Reviews.Author: Dr. Arthur A. Thompson, Jr.
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my grandson and he is thrilled with it. It is "replacing" his old laptop computer.

Reviews.Title: great for everyone
Reviews.Author: Ralph B. Richey
Reviews.Content: Got it for my wife and she can't put it down. Guess I need to get one for myself. LOL

Reviews.Title: I love this product
Reviews.Author: Eddy Chance
Reviews.Content: It had a great display. It was very easy to setup and I started using it immediately. It was easy to transfer applications from my iPhone 4s to the new iPad.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad with Retina Display MD510LL/A (16GB, Wi-Fi, Black) NEWEST...
Reviews.Author: Moe Skeeto
Reviews.Content: The best way to describe this iPad is "WOW."  It has everything you need to "conduct business" when you're away, or to simply pass the time with the many included apps and games.  Works great with a nearby Wi-Fi, but also with my iPhone which has a built in "Hotspot."  Apple is the best!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Dwight Lilly
Reviews.Content: I am extremely happy with the quality of the display.  The ipad is exactly what I was looking for in a tablet.  We are planning a trip to Germany and expect to use it for referencing and to take pictures and movies.

Reviews.Title: Loves
Reviews.Author: The Black Rapper
Reviews.Content: My wife loves it. The new Apple iPad with Retina display 32gb white 4th generation is so smooth and user friendly. Done.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet ever
Reviews.Author: G
Reviews.Content: Hands down, the retina dipslay is the most amazing dipslay ever. This is the best tab,et so far. Heavily recommended

Reviews.Title: Resisted iPad for years-outstanding product
Reviews.Author: ESPRESSO MAVEN
Reviews.Content: Product is awesome-quality and display nothing short of incredible. Anxious to transfer my windows experience to apple format with xls, word and other type documents.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: What can I say...great product. I'm not a very techie person but the iPad is user friendly, light, and has a great battery life. The display is crystal clear. I did have to update the software when it arrived because the camera and photo app would not work. I was ready to go the Apple store for them to trouble shoot it but my friend figured it out first.

Reviews.Title: Careful- wrong iPad sent
Reviews.Author: js
Reviews.Content: The box showed the latest iPad A1458 but the older model was in the box (A1416) along with the older style 30-pin connector.  Sending back for a refund.

Reviews.Title: So  DONE apple products
Reviews.Author: KEK
Reviews.Content: It is not the iPad as much as the apple os updates which keep messing up my iTunes and songs.  I have purchased and extensive library of songs and the past two updates have caused the songs to no longer be found showing them as not available on my iPad but trying to direct me to the cloud.  I think this is apples way of trying to force customers to pay for their cloud space which I am not interested in. It took me Hours to fix it the first time and it has happened again. Since I have all my music also on a backup drive... It is time to try a new tablet and no more apple for us.  Apple support is no help.  We are now looking at a galaxy tab and will go for that and drop all apple products.

Reviews.Title: Great upgrade experience
Reviews.Author: Dov
Reviews.Content: I bought the first iPad when it debuted a few years ago and it has gotten heavy use by my wife and son ever since. A few things happened recently. I bought a 13" MacBook Pro, but I haven't completely transferred iTunes from my PC desktop to the MB. That said, when I received this iPad 4 as a gift, I let it sit in the box for a few days while I thought about how I would transfer iTunes to the MB and start the new iPad with a fresh sync. Well, I scrapped that idea and opened the unit anyway. To my surprise, the cloud service automatically copied the apps, calendar, contacts, bookmarks etc to the new unit. I can not describe clear enough what a relief the setup was.I am super happy with this product. The retina display is nice, the speed is very good. I'm happy that all of my computing is so much easier the more I have integrated my data into this Apple world. I have used PC's for over 20 years and have never particularly liked Apple. I only wished I had moved over sooner.

Reviews.Title: Love my Ipad
Reviews.Author: Lochthyme
Reviews.Content: I have an iPhone 4s which I use to take photos.  I then will switch over to my iPad to edit some of them for the convenience of being able to see them better....like the large size screen.  Plus some terrific art apps available for the iPad.  I like the large size, the apps available and the retina display.  If you are looking for a tablet the iPad is a terrific choice especially for those who like to do art.  Whether it be drawing, painting or photography.  Lots of terrific apps out there to meet your needs.  Nice size for working on...not too small.  Nice and portable so you can bring it with you where you go.

Reviews.Title: This is awesome
Reviews.Author: rewreviewer
Reviews.Content: I made the mistake to buy the basic model when it came out, glad my roomate bough it from me, I ran out of space very fast, so I bough this model, lots of space and it just works, seriously not sure why you would spend all that money, on the new ones, when your eyes can't not real tell, if you are looking at a retina display or not.This one is perfect, I can download a few movies to waste my time when traveling, battery is awesome, and I really don't miss anything than the new models have at all.great product, thanks guys

Reviews.Title: BEST THING SINCE SLICED BREAD
Reviews.Author: Jo Rae Wolf
Reviews.Content: GO BIG OR STAY HOME THIS IS MY 3rd IPAD IT IS BY FAR THE BEST. MEGA STORAGE WILL LAST MY LIFE TIME.VERY EASY TO DO ANYTHING YOU NEED OR WANT. THIS GIRLS NEW BEST FRIEND.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: VESTALIA TORRES
Reviews.Content: Very good product. tough, durable and economical to use that I give. 100 percent recommended for the purchase of this product.

Reviews.Title: A welcome upgrade
Reviews.Author: Matthew P. Tebussek
Reviews.Content: This is definitely a welcome upgrade to my ipad 2 which hs served me well.  The retina display has twice the pixel density and makes text and pics crystal clear and sharp. Faster processor is nice as well.  If you don't like iOS then this is not for you. Don't listen to the negative reviews if those that do not like apple products. This is a solid piece if hardware from apple. Make sure you do your homework because a lot of the ones listed on here are more than you can buy them for new in the store.  They go for 399 new so don't be fooled.

Reviews.Title: Good iPad
Reviews.Author: Joshua
Reviews.Content: No scratches and was delivered on time and works great. Partner loves it and see lots of good use out of this like the majority of apple products

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: SLE
Reviews.Content: I bought this one to save money over the iPad air.  It allowed me to update the operating system for free once I synced it up to my computer, so it's just as good as the newer version.

Reviews.Title: Great Service
Reviews.Author: Paulette Lesane
Reviews.Content: I had been meaning to upgrade my iPad to 128GB for some time, but the prices were too high.  I found the best price on Amazon and received the item well before the EDD ( est. del. date).  My overall experience was exactly what I've come to expect from Amazon, Superb!  Thanks for the experience, Paulette.

Reviews.Title: I love this iPad
Reviews.Author: Regina M. Shirley
Reviews.Content: For the price, this is the iPad you want. I upgraded from an iPad 2 to this one. Very glad I did.

Reviews.Title: a brand new ipad
Reviews.Author: Haoqi
Reviews.Content: although it's called a used one, but it looks like a brand new one by all means. feel confident to buy.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Acarsess
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband as a surprise for Christmas gift during the Black Friday promotion. It's a great product and because it came from an authorized Apple dealer, I was able to purchase Apple Care with no problem.  The iPad did not come with a SIM card which I thought it would have.  I contacted the vendor directly and got a response within a few hours of how to get one from AT&T.;  There was no charge for the SIM card.  My husband loves it!

Reviews.Title: Grandson thinks Grandpop is the best for getting him the iPad!
Reviews.Author: Thomas E. Curley
Reviews.Content: My grandson loves it. I got him this for Christmas and he has it with him every time he visits. Even takes it to bed. I got the 32GB model, since we learned with the iPod that 16GB doesn't hold much. The resolution on this model is unmatched. I bought it on Amazon cheap enough that I could get a 2 year "Drop N Break" Square Trade warranty, and still had money left over the retail prices.

Reviews.Title: IPad fourth edition
Reviews.Author: Janet R. Showers
Reviews.Content: You sent me a used one as a new one. Full of someone's info. Contacts etc. my grandson who is an IT wiped it clean and I kept it but was very disappointed!!!!

Reviews.Title: Winner
Reviews.Author: Adena
Reviews.Content: Love my iPad, however this need it has to just randomly close out of apps is rather annoying. Other than that the 4th generation was a great cheaper buy for me through Amazon, rather than buying the Air with just not enough differences!

Reviews.Title: ipad with issues
Reviews.Author: keith weaver
Reviews.Content: so far my ipad has messed up twice. I did a complete reinstall the first time and this time i am considering contacting the seller to get a replacement for it. My printer is completely compatable with it...HP officjet 8600 wireless....The first time it quit communicating with my network and it caused my printer date and time settings to change...the date jumped ahead a day. I first reset the printer settings and then reset it on my network. The ipad still wouldn't communicate with it so i hooked it to my laptop and did a reinstall. It worked great for maybe 2-3 weeks and yesterday it quit communicating with my printer again only it didn't affect the printer settings. The printer works wirelessly with my other computers fine and i really don't want to do another reinstall as this shouldn't be necessary. Keith Weaver

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 4
Reviews.Author: B. Embree "Bet"
Reviews.Content: Love it!  Lightweight, easy to install, easily transportable.  Font size adjustable.  Sharp and clear photos.  Makes life so organized because you have everything at your finger tips 24/7

Reviews.Title: Unboxing iPad 4 (1st Impressions)
Reviews.Author: M. W. Trimble

} } } Length:: 4:51 MinsAS you can see I have no arms.I have ALWAYS loved iPhones and iPads (no Macs sorry) & when the iPad 4 128 gigabyte wifi model was on sale brand new for $550 I couldn't pass up the opportunity!This iPad feels like my iPad 2 but runs MUCH smoother and faster! I chose this over the iPad Air due to its specs being similar minus the size and upgraded chip; other than that I couldn't justify spending more for essentially the same device at 128 gigabytes.I upgraded to iOS 7.0.4 right out of the box via wifi in about 15 minutes (it aborted the first time but after plugging it in to the power outlet attempt #2 was a success!)Where I do not love Apple is in having to start from scratch & reload this new iPad with my content from the iPad 2 (no I do not & refuse to use iTunes due to its cumbersome nature & counter-intuitive user interface [I did use iTunes once but when my laptop was stolen & I synced my iPhone 4 to my new laptop iTunes would NOT let me sync it as Apple only allows ONE computer to be physically registered/assigned to an iDevice] so begins the tedious process of porting everything over.I DO though LOVE that Apple's enture suite of software is now available for download for FREE with iOS 7!I will update you all with further observations but judging from my iPad 2 experience I have no doubt i will LOVE this iPad 4 (the retina resolution OMG is a VERY vivid much needed improvement to the iPad). If you do have a physical disability or missing a body part the iPad is very handicap friendly. I type flawlessly with my toes on the keyboard and from time to time use my nose as a thumb if you will.[...]

Reviews.Title: Big change from original iPad
Reviews.Author: Tammy
Reviews.Content: I had the first generation iPad and the new iPad 4 is very nice in comparison.  I decided on it rather than the iPad Air because I didn't see a whole lot of difference in the two for my needs.  I am sure the iPad Air is worth the price difference for many, but the iPad 4 suited me perfectly and I am very pleased with it!

Reviews.Title: Perfect Gift
Reviews.Author: Margo
Reviews.Content: I bought this iPad for my mom for Christmas could not wait to give it to her.When I gave it to her she was totally surprised and loves it, she uses it everyday.

Reviews.Title: I bought it Used and it came like new
Reviews.Author: Cibert
Reviews.Content: Really Great, When this seller said Like new, He Really mean it. Was Like New in its box pefectly wrapped every accesory was in there.And i paid for it 150 dollars less :)

Reviews.Title: Not a great pad
Reviews.Author: Kitty Cahoon
Reviews.Content: I only had it for 5days when it fell off my night stand and the screen literally crunched into a million tiny pieces. I have iPad1 and ipad2 both have dropped numerous times Never cracked!Dealing with Amazon sucked....the gentleman in customer service was unaudible...in the emails they never sent me an RA.THANKS TO AMEX I'll be compensated.

Reviews.Title: should have bought this long time ago!
Reviews.Author: happily retired
Reviews.Content: I wanted to learn apple products and never had any so I decided to start on something simple.  Needed a little bit of help but you can get that from apple for free.  Love this iPad I bought!

Reviews.Title: Apple does it right
Reviews.Author: Colin L. Love
Reviews.Content: Apple does it right with the i-pad.  They just need to get the  price down a bit to compete better with newcomers to the market.

Reviews.Title: Best... Tablet.... EVER!
Reviews.Author: Michael O'neil
Reviews.Content: Very powerful, easy to use, clear screen that's crystal clear.. All in all, just a very pleasant device to work with...

Reviews.Title: IPad Purchase
Reviews.Author: ROBERT B KEMP
Reviews.Content: I already had an iPad but needed one for my wife.  Since I loaded mine up we only needed a slightly less robust unit and this does the trick

Reviews.Title: APPLE IPAD WITH RETINA DISPLAY
Reviews.Author: DIXIE BOYD
Reviews.Content: I LOVE IT AND IT WORKS GREAT. LOVE THAT IT COMES IN TWO COLORS ALSO. I WOULD RECOMEND THIS TO ANYONE.

Reviews.Title: 1st time iPad
Reviews.Author: EC505
Reviews.Content: We love how easy it was to use right out of the box.  Connected immediately to our wireless with minimal setup.  Gets a few hours use every day but only needs a charge after 3 or 4 days. Members of the family who swear they "hate technology" use more than anyone else because it is "so easy".

Reviews.Title: I LOVE this iPad
Reviews.Author: Michelle Burchfield
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son for his 18th birthday along with a cover/keyboard.  I couldn't have purchased anything better for him to take off to college!

Reviews.Title: iPad/Technology Lover
Reviews.Author: S. Cook "Steel Magnolia"
Reviews.Content: Since I own an iPad 2nd generation (just gave to daughter), iPad Mini, iPhone, iPod, and Kindle Fire, I purchased this larger screen for camera upgrade, and use of DISH Anywhere, HBO GO, etc. for travel/cruising.  Hope the Wi-Fi/AT&T; feature will enable me to use on a cruise in our stateroom and not have to pay exorbitant prices in a "shared" computer room. Now my husband and I both, with our 2 upgraded iPads, can hopefully entertain ourselves when we travel.  Wanted also to have the most current w/128 GB and Wi-Fi + AT&T.;  Love it! However, I still find the data plan and the iCloud data confusing.  When I started this technology "journey," I would have like to have been told that, even after purchasing the product, there are other fees required, which run up the usage bill.Steel MagnoliaBeautiful Smoky Mts.Sevierville, TN

Reviews.Title: You can't go wrong with iPad!
Reviews.Author: f "f"
Reviews.Content: Listen to people who own other brand tablets. All they talk about is how their tablet is better than iPad. Now listen to and iPad owner…He is having a nice conversation with you asking about your day?. Wait. Why isn't he talking about other tablets?See what happened there?

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Sporty1
Reviews.Content: We started with one of the top-rated android tablets, which is nice, but the iPad blows it away in many ways.  The iPad is so much easier to use and to figure out.  I still use the android, but only for a few applications.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Joel Linarez
Reviews.Content: I love my new iPad. It has an excellent screen. I love the camera, in photos and vídeos the quality is great... At night pictures are not as good as in the day, but is ok...

Reviews.Title: Excellent picture quality
Reviews.Author: ElleS555
Reviews.Content: So far I have had it for about a month. I really enjoy watching videos and movies, excellent picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: Soccergirl087
Reviews.Content: I just received this iPad yesterday (which was earlier than I was expecting), and I love it! It was easy to set up, and it's so much fun! Watching Netflix shows on this is so great, because everything is so clear! I just love this iPad.

Reviews.Title: Not as good as a laptop, but hey
Reviews.Author: Xenosaiyan
Reviews.Content: It's much more expensive than a laptop, probably has more graphics power and more reliable, but besides that it's not there yet. Even with the supercharged Apple A6X dual core processor CPU it's still not enough to get rid of the laggggg that I get when I go to different websites and besides that the other issue is that it doesn't do flash, but that's not much of an issue with HTML 5 I can do almost everything a laptop can. I'm using the iPad with a keyboard and it feels almost like a laptop.Not exactly 5 stars, but close, it's a very very very good substitute and the battery life is much better than a laptop/s.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed
Reviews.Author: MARTIN HARO DE LA VEGA
Reviews.Content: I got an Iphone and is my "little" tool in work. But Ipad, is the best for presentations, typing or prepare documents...and PORTABLE.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: Great product! Really enjoy using it!Very easy to navigate and very useful! I bring it with me everyday!Made me life so much easier!

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it!
Reviews.Author: Vicki Hackler
Reviews.Content: I love the ease of working on the iPad. I love that it is larger than my kindle. It was of the best things I've ever purchased.

Reviews.Title: I'm no early adopter.  This is a good generational jump from iPad 1 to iPad 4
Reviews.Author: Eagle Vision
Reviews.Content: I have had an iPad 1 for about 2 years.  With the apps that I use through the Apple store, I have gotten more than enough use out of it.  The iPad 2 was not enough of a generational jump without upgraded graphics, and the iPad 3 wasn't enough because of the resolution of the camera.  However, this model is truly a wonder and it will be with me until iPad 8 comes out, I suppose.The integrated camera has excellent resolution, as does the video.  The processor is perceivable faster for graphics intensive games such as those by Gameloft, EA Sports and the like.  Sound seems to have improved, as well.Although the latest rendition uses a different port from the predecessors, it's easier to use since either orientation will work.  It does essentially make my accessories, though, obsolete.  That means a new speaker dock, car charger and whatever else I may need.  However, I have become accustomed to using Bluetooth peripherals making connectivity more seamless.Operation is pretty much identical, and then there's Siri.  I find limited use for Siri since I have a Wifi-only iPad.  I can type faster than hold the Home button to talk, and voice recognition is ok.  Not great.  I can touch type must faster than Siri can understand me and react.  However, I'll give it more time.The housing is as small as iPad 2 and 3.  Battery life is essentially the same since Bluetooth and Wifi are always on with a 75% brightness.  The volume control is responsive.Since I have over 1200 apps, I'm pretty much stuff with Apple.  That is the main reason I haven't considered other operating systems, apart from the Kindle Fire.Overall, I'm pleased.  If you don't have an iPad, this is finally the one.  If you're waiting to upgrade from iPad 1 or 2, then it's a no-brainer.  iPad 3 is certainly not that much behind.  Intuitively, I prefer to have a jump in processing, graphics, sound and resolution before I plan to update, again.I love this device.Two thumbs up.Update:I decided to jump up in memory to the 128 GB version.  Music, movies and applications take up a lot of memory.  Aside from the jump in memory, there are no discernible changes in operation or battery life.

Reviews.Title: coolest stuff ever had
Reviews.Author: lukeli
Reviews.Content: bought it for my wife and now she is using it everyday. we both like it very much. The display is awesome and the apps are very considerate.

Reviews.Title: What can I say...
Reviews.Author: Dennis W. Simpson "Dennis"
Reviews.Content: It is great. It arrived on time and in good condition. All the accessories were there, and it worked perfectly.  It was a gift and the receiver was very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Love, love it!
Reviews.Author: Debbie Stephenson
Reviews.Content: Another great Apple product. This is my second IPad and I love them both and use them on a daily basis.

Reviews.Title: Love My iPad!
Reviews.Author: Rose
Reviews.Content: I take it everywhere and it has met all my expectations.  It's not heavy at all to carry around and I have down-loaded all my aps and music.  So glad I got it for myself as a Christmas gift! LOL

Reviews.Title: Excelent hardware and software
Reviews.Author: Vitaly Chuban
Reviews.Content: I have bought iPaf 1 about three years ago, it was good. Now just few days ago I`ve bought iPad 4 (the maximum configuration), it is much faster, good screen resolution, my first impression is very good!

Reviews.Title: Simply the best tablet on the market
Reviews.Author: AppleSaucer "Paul"
Reviews.Content: The spectacular 9.7 inch Retina Display in Apple's full-size iPad is now matched with a custom System-on-Chip (SoC) that has the graphic muscle to take full advantage of its capabilities. The screen on this iPad is incredible! It totally blows away my HDTV.The 4th generation iPad also offers an overall speedier response than the 3rd generation model, along with the tiny new Lightning connector instead of a traditional 30-pin type. If you have a lot of peripherals that fit the older connector, you will need to a buy an adaptor if you want to keep using themI find myself using the iPad for roughly 80% of the activities that I used to do on my laptop. It is now my first choice for web browsing, and it is great for reading e-books. And it is more and more often my preferred way to watch movies and TV programs.Before buying, I compared this iPad to other high-quality tablets such as the 10-inch Nexus. As far as the displays go, the iPad was the clear winner. If the quality of the graphics is high on your list of priorities for a tablet, the 4th generation iPad is far and away the best choice.

Reviews.Title: Apple I-Pad 4
Reviews.Author: Dorinda Morpeth "POTTERSAILOR"
Reviews.Content: Gift for my husband, who had been drooling over his brother's I-Pad 3.  He loves it and it does everything he needs it to do.  I am not an Apple fan but if you are the nicer 64-bit is the way to go.Recommend

Reviews.Title: Buyer Beware
Reviews.Author: Patricia B.
Reviews.Content: Actually this product purchased from anywhere else would likely be great but purchasing this from Tech Giant was a giant mistake.No where in their product description or posting did it state that this iPad did not come with a sim card. I think that it was dishonest of them to not mention this. Who wants to do business with a company like that?  I originally thought that it was an error on their part and that once alerted to this they would make it right.  I sent them an email and when that didn't get a response I went to Amazon's Customer Service.  They kindly wrote an inquiry for me but they didn't even get a response.  If I had discovered it sooner I would be shipping this back, but unfortunately for me it was just after the allowed return date!  So, I am sounding the alarm for all who would be tempted to purchase from them - don't buy from Tech Giant.

Reviews.Title: Do not purchase from this vendor
Reviews.Author: Peter Gelpke
Reviews.Content: I ordered a new iPad air and received an iPad 4. It was the classic bait and switch. I only shopped for the new air and only saw that air was missing when I received the confirmation email. It still stated Newest Version, but that was not true. I am in the process of returning it. The woman who helped me at Amazon was amazing and extremely helpful and friendly.

Reviews.Title: Fist tablet, second apple product.
Reviews.Author: Claire Harris
Reviews.Content: My first apple product was a shuffle that I won as a door prize years ago. I used it often & it held up well. I still have it but used my phone's mp3 instead. I got this iPad as a gift with purchase from a local jeweler, I paid for the upgrade from 16 GB to 64. I was disappointed to learn that the only memory I could ever have was the one that was installed. I had been considering purchasing an Asus transformer 700, that has endless possibilities for expandable memory. I like the iPad but I was hoping that the display would be easier to look at outside. I live in Tennessee & it is sunny nearly every day. Still, it's winter & the sun in lower & weaker than it is in summer. Maybe if I can reduce the glare it will be better. I like the portability and have seen reviews saying it is like a brick because it's too heavy, that's silly. If you think that, you might need to hit the gym.

Reviews.Title: User unfriendly
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: I've been a pc user for 30 years.  Started with an Apple in '81.  Switched to Microsoft pc's in '84 due to lack of software for Apple. I've always heard Apple was user friendly and intuitive  ----NOT.  Especially not their tablet.  File transfers from computer to tablet (iPad) very cumbersome.  Can't just drag and drop from MAC or PC over the network.  Have to go through multistep process with iTunes.  Have to transfer photos in albums.  Once you transfer you can't delete just one photo from the iPad.  You have to delete the whole album, go to your MAC or PC (if iTunes program on your PC works like Apple says it is supposed to - mine doesn't), make a new album with all but the one photo you want to delete from your iPad, sync the album back to the iPad.  On other tablets, just access the network and delete or drag and drop the desired files.  So getting on your home wi-fi network with your iPad only allows you to get on the web.  Doesn't allow you to access the directories of other computers and transfer files with drag and drop or cut and paste or use most printers on the network (only Air printers) like other tablets, desktops or laptops can.  All work arounds seem cumbersome and are not intuitive.  Also, since iPads have no SD slots or USB ports that support thumb drives, Apple forces you to by the most expensive memory there is - the built in memory that comes with the iPads when you buy them and can't be changed.Surprised and disappointed in Apple

Reviews.Title: Apple Ipad 4
Reviews.Author: SF
Reviews.Content: This product is exactly what we needed.  The Retina display is very clear.We use this for our business aps and it was more reasonable than the ipad air which  seemed to be more about the weight.

Reviews.Title: Not happy
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: I don't understand why something that cost so much don't support a flash player? I'm very disappointed with this problem.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful but Heavy
Reviews.Author: Muchu Kaingu
Reviews.Content: I bought this mostly for reading. The text is crisp and the device is beautiful. The only downside for me is the weight.

Reviews.Title: As Solid as  Ever
Reviews.Author: Radha
Reviews.Content: A very nice tablet with rock solid stability.Extremely dependable as ever.Nothing much to say except.... IT JUST WORKS :)

Reviews.Title: too many  problems
Reviews.Author: C. Donath "reader"
Reviews.Content: could not download my apps and over 300 books from older i-pad, kept getting waiting on all items, even after 24 hurs of being charged. finally got frustrated and sent the unit back to the shipper this monday. apple tech support would not work with me becdause the original pad was sold in march, i assume to my shipper.  will buy a new i-pad direct from apple as soon as my account is credited by the prvious shipper

Reviews.Title: Still connected to previous owners iCloud.
Reviews.Author: Jennie
Reviews.Content: This purchase was a huge disappointment for me. It arrived extremely fast, which was great, it was in excellent condition for a used iPad. The problem lies in the fact that iPads are not checked to make sure they are no longer connected to the previous owners iCloud account. In the event this happens there is absolutely no way to use the iPad (I tried everything) which makes it a huge disappointment. Especially since this was the second one I purchased (the other was from another seller) that arrived "locked". Although I had a terrible experience with this item customer service was quick, friendly, and I received a full refund as soon as they received the item back. So it could've ended worse I suppose. My daughter had to wait an additional two weeks after her birthday for her iPad (which I purchased new in a store) but everything is ok now.

Reviews.Title: The Air Came Out and I'm Still Thrilled With the One I Have
Reviews.Author: John P. Thiel "John P. Thiel"
Reviews.Content: It's termed the iPad 4 but technically it's the iPad 6.I bought this particular model several months after its release at an AT&T; store in a mall.  They had it in stock, so I was thrilled with the fact that I could walk out of the store on my lunch break with a fully functioning new iPad.  I'm a sucker for picking things up in person, unless it means waiting on a line with people who think they are 'making history' with their purchase, in which case I just have it shipped to me at home or work, most likely from Amazon.This is my first iPad.  I held off on buying one because I'm a film geek and wanted a full HD display.  When Apple came out with the Retina Display, I thought, "That's great, but with a maximum of 64GB it's still just a toy.  I need at least 120GB."  And then they came out with a 128GB model plus a better port and it was time to buy.  All my friends who rushed to buy the first iPad, the iPad 2, and 'The New iPad' as the 3rd generation model was called were definitely jealous; but more important for me was that I got exactly what I wanted.In fact I was so happy with getting exactly what I wanted that when the iPad Air came out, a little faster and lighter than the one I bought, it didn't make a difference to me.  Sure, I'm looking forward to when Apple comes out with what I predict will be a larger, more powerful, fully functioning computer in iPad form--and I'm predicting it will be called the iPad Pro--but even then I'll probably wait until at least the next generation of that model before buying it unless it features the ability to use Final Cut Pro (which no current iPad can do).Will you regret buying this one instead of the iPad Air or waiting for the next model?  I don't think so.  First thing, it's nearly as powerful as the iPad Air, and if you wait for the next model you're going to pay top dollar.  If you wait for the price to drop, then you're going to want the model after that.  And the cycle of suffering on this matter is endless.When you're ready to buy, then buy.  Buy the one you want.  This one versus the Air, personally I think the only significant difference is price, that you're not missing something.  Just make sure to buy it new from an authorized Apple dealer.

Reviews.Title: A gift
Reviews.Author: Jdoggy
Reviews.Content: Great tablet for those that want the simplicity of an apple product without more advanced options for storage.  The display is superb.  I also have an Acer Iconia A700 with a beautiful display but I have to be honest, I love the android OS and the A700 has a great screen but the Apple just looks better in all lighting conditions and the touch response is superb.  Apple has the most apps available and most android apps have an Apple counterpart so you sure can't go wrong there.  My only complaints are not so much on the Ipad but the philosophy behind it, NO easy expansion options.  There are ways to take more movies and music with you using a mobile wifi external USB or card reader such as the EasyACC device but it is more cumbersome than just sliding in a card as I can do with the Acer.  Tablets are a product that many of use are now heavily reliant on. I travel a lot and a laptop was always kind of a pain to lug around.  This Ipad is definitely a high quality item with exceptional battery life and great user experience as long as you factor in the limitations of the minute 16GBs of storage.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Quality
Reviews.Author: Shaina Cochrane
Reviews.Content: Lets face it, you buy Apple products at their ridiculously high price because it's a quality item. Safari is an wasting Internet browser to use and, while you can't customize settings as much as a laptop computer, it has excellent malware protection and is set up very conveniently for the casual browser. It's a good weight too. While shopping for my tablet, I've looked at and held many other brands. A common problem (for me) is that a lot of them felt too light for their size. This is probably because apple uses aluminum for the back cover of their tablet instead of plastic. It feels sturdy, and that's a good thing when it comes to durability. Another excellent apple quality? The apps! I know, other tablets have apps too, but apple has kind of cornered the market on app production. Most of what you can find on an android or kindle tablet, you can find in the apple store (and then some). See an app not available through apple? Probably a good thing! I've learned that Apple screens all of their apps before putting it up in the store. This means that there are no major malware problems. There are some disadvantages of course: 1- you have to buy directly from apple as they do have monopoly on their stuff and a lot of imitation items are suspect (this can get pricey), 2- you can't really open two screens the way you can simultaneously on other devices. This is not to say that you can't have two (or more) things running at once, but you have to switch entirely between them and can't view both on the screen at once. 3- there are many conveniently pre-downloaded onto other tablets that are very useful for students and office work. You can get a lot of those same apps through the apple store, but many of the better ones are not free and you have to pick and choose your way through quite a few applications.There are probably more then 3, but these are the ones that stood out to me. Overall though, PROs totally outweigh the CONs, making this tablet just plain awesome! (So awesome that my best friend saved started saving up for one right after mine came in the mail.)

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: apollo
Reviews.Content: This review will be very brief and basic; there are other great reviews out there that really dive into the in's and out's of this particular product.I love it!  Just like my relationship with my smartphone, don't leave home without it.  Crystal clear on graphics.  Of course, this is my first ipad so I cannot really compare it on past experience.  Tons of apps, batteries lasts ok.  100% can last for about a day (I actually used it for about an hour every hour, and by about 9-930 pm, battery was at 15%.  Again, depending on what you are doing, it lasted me for about 2 more hours (I think).Price was great!  Seller was AWESOME (they actually gave me a cover for this ipad as a token of appreciation for the business).  However, with that being said, if you have kids that always run around, MAKE SURE TO INVEST on a more "military" style case.  If you call Apple, the only thing that they could suggest was..., well sir, just buy a new one??!?  (yeah, like I have $500 bucks, spewing out from my pockets.  My response; okay let me go to my money tree and pick some bills out, goodbye!  If you go to an electronics store, make sure to have at least $200 laying around.  I broke/cracked my screen after 2 weeks!  So needless to say, a case with something covering the actual screen, yes it is a must!  No flash, no usb port, but takes good pictures and speakers are good as well.Item was shipped fast, very fast!  Definitely ordering from this person again!

Reviews.Title: Amazing.
Reviews.Author: John Wilson
Reviews.Content: I love everything Apple. I have 3 iPod's, a nano, a classic, and a touch. Two iPhone's, the 4, and the 5. One iMac (latest model), and the Macbook Pro. This beautiful iPad was glad to live amongst his friends in my room. Beautiful retina, lots of space, 3G, how much better can an iPad get? It arrived with no scrathes whatsoever, charges fine, superb condition. I recommend anything Apple to anyone anytime. Great product, great price.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Winsbert Quow
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a birthday gift for my wife and she absolutely loves it, so I shall not complain. Takes great photos in the daytime, easy to carry around, lots of Apps available, connects quickly to WIFI, looks cool etc. For all these reasons and more I give it a five star rating.

Reviews.Content: The display is very crisp. The only drawback that I see is something I had heard about--the change in the cable for recharging. It is totally useless for any other device and if it is lost . . .

Reviews.Title: A bit pricey...
Reviews.Author: djo
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for adult son for his birthday. He loves it! Was a bit expensive, but nothing else on the market compares as well. Overall, would recommend this if you are very picky, but could purchase lesser expensive models such as IPad 2, that will do almost as much and save a few dollars.

Reviews.Title: Love my new Ipad!
Reviews.Author: Pauline Anderson
Reviews.Content: I received my Ipad 4th gen. from my husband for my birthday.  I have had it for a week, and absolutely love it.  It is so easy to use and the apps are excellent.  I received a Kindle Fire for Christmas last year, but it doesn't hold a candle to the ipad with retina display.  I got the 32GB with wi-fi + verizon in white.  I also have a Luvvitt Keyboard Cover with backlights, and it looks and works great with the new ipad.

Reviews.Title: iPad 4

Reviews.Content: My experience with my iPad has been nothing but positive.  My first & definitely not my last as it has just about replaced my PC.

I told him numerous times that I just wanted to get my password in. $200 and over three hours on the phone still did not get a password on ipad. Pad will not let me have password so therefore I'm unable to use this Apple ipad. I feel like I've been  ripped off.Do you have any suggestions?

Reviews.Content: One might wonder how it's still priced almost the same to IPad Air, is there any reason for that unless you really have to have one before Air version is available in a few days? I understand if you bought one already but does it makes any sense for the new customers?

Reviews.Title: AWFUL mistake
Reviews.Author: Barbara Bickmore
Reviews.Content: On Dec. 11th I wanted to download a program and was told to update to Ios7 (or some such).  It took me 6 hours and wiped out all my data.  All my photos, my programs.  We spent 2 days and numerous hours on the phone with apple who said this download was a problem (especially for iPhone users) and they were sorry, but they were having trouble with it.  So, it's like I have a new iPad and have to program it and add my apps and cry over losing my photos and art lessons on iBooks.  They don't even warn people about the problems with updating with this program. It's random because my daughter had no problems, but they admit to its being problematic!!!!!!  Problematic, ha!  They say they're sorry and I have lost too much!  They also say the iPad does not save anything over 30 days, that if you want to backup you need to connect to a computer periodically and do it that way.  Boy, this would never have been allowed out in public if Steve Jobs was still here!

Reviews.Title: Completely Messed Up
Reviews.Author: Yang
Reviews.Content: I ordered an iPad (with retina display), but I received an iPad mini.  So I double checked my order record and the charge amount.  There was no mistake on what I ordered and what was charged to me. Even the Amazon shipment sheet printed the item as "Apple iPad with Retina Display MD513LL/A ... (Sold by TechGiant)".  Now I have to go through the Amazon return process to send it back, waiting to see what hassle I would have to go through next.  I'm very very disappointed.Not sure how this could happen to the shipping process between TechGiant and Amazon.  It just didn't make sense.  I hope Amazon look into this incident and refine its operations to prevent it happening again.  In the further, I have to stay away from ordering any "big" item from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: No SIM card included or installed
Reviews.Author: Lola Hansen
Reviews.Content: I ordered this iPad with prime shipping because it was needed right away on the road. Was very disappointed that it didn't not have a SIM card so it could be connected to AT&T.; The only reason a person would buy an iPad with Wi-Fi + AT&T; is to actually have AT&T.; The iPad may have been ok besides that but since it was needed for it's connection to the internet it was worthless to me when it was needed most. If a SIM card needs to be purchased separately that should be clearly stated. This is the 4th (and maybe the last) iPad in the family and we have never had this problem before. I was very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: AWFUL
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: This was a HORRIBLE experience. Not only was the product advertised as new and when it came it was NOT new but the previous owner still had the device linked to their iCloud account and therefore there was nothing Apple could do in order to help me activate it under my Apple ID information. SO UPSET by this!!!! The only good thing is Amazon is giving me a full refund and I'm taking that money and buying a product at an actual store. I usually love everything I purchase from Amazon, but note to self NEVER BUYING ELECTRONICS AGAIN ON AMAZON.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value for those of us who don't need the newest
Reviews.Author: David D. "David"
Reviews.Content: Ever since getting my wife the iPad Air for my wife for Christmas, I have wanted once, but just didn't have the funds for another Air.  My wife found this iPad 4 new on Amazon for far less than Apple wanted for refurbished and sellers wanted on eBay for used.  Aside from being slightly heavier than the Air, you'd be hard pressed to tell the difference.  I have found it to be far more useful than I ever imagined.  The Verizon 4G rocks and comes in very useful for my on the go life style.  My laptop is now relegated to the Den where it still comes in handy for syncing our iDevices, Quicken, MS Office and the few things that can't yet be accomplished on a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Worst choice on digital devices I've ever made
Reviews.Author: Xiaotian Le
Reviews.Content: In the past three years as an Android user I always heard, and experienced that iOS is much more fluent, or smooth than Android. However, that's no longer true, at least when comparing iPad 4 to my HTC One. iPad 4 is just as smooth as HTC One, and is still laggy sometimes (For example the frame rate of some animation drops significantly). The screen is a bit yellow, and its overall performance is on a par with HTC One. iPad 4's hardware technically is faster, but no any difference is found on system speed so far. Therefore, iPad has no advantage over HTC One, except the much bigger screen.On the other hand, Android is of course MUCH freer and easier to use. The iOS and iTunes always takes me hours to do something that can just be done in three minutes on Android. (Copying pictures from iPad that was not taken as photos, etc)I was SHOCKED when I found I cannot install an IME or a system tool, cannot customize the system UI or configuration, and even cannot copy files from others' computer without logging into iTunes! These are untolerable. Jailbreak solves some of them, but no jailbreak is available for iPad 4 over 6.13 so far.iPad 4 is just a toy for those who don't want to manage it, but only use it.

Reviews.Title: Very Good item
Reviews.Author: Benedito Eloi Maya "Maya"
Reviews.Content: This product is amazing. It's not perfect, but considering that I'll have it for at least 2 years and I've used it every day so far, It's very sturdy and I know it will hold up well, as my other Apple products have.

Reviews.Title: Bought for myself

Reviews.Content: I love, love live my new iPad!  Thus is my first iPad.  I use it all the time but I purchased it primarily to use in church choir so I don't have to lug around the huge choir book!

Reviews.Title: Exasperated and underwhelmed
Reviews.Author: Kat "doglover"
Reviews.Content: I don't know why people are so enamored with this product, I find it nothing short of exasperating. Constantly drops the network, even after I installed a network analyzer and check that for signal all the time.  My other devices never have this problem. Could not pair via Bluetooth to other devices , grabbing pictures from other devices is a pain in the butt if it works at all.  Does not recognize non-apple devices even with the proper cables.  Takes forever for network pages to load when it does recognize the network. Feel like throwing it against the wall at least once a day. The touch screen is sometimes unresponsive and Safari crashes _all_the_time.  And thanks for the blasted autocorrect bs, apple, I know what word I want to use. Extremely frustrating product.

Reviews.Title: I love it

Reviews.Content: Very practical, very useful, i have some problems if i have to work with without internet. It resist my son

Reviews.Title: Less Than Expected For Apple Product
Reviews.Author: Bob B
Reviews.Content: The touch screen of the iPad does not work well using a finger, so a capacitive stylus is a must have and Apple does not provide one with the iPad. Battery operating time on a single charge is extraordinary! Manual switches on the sides of the iPad are difficult to operate, especially with a cover on the iPad. The cost of a cover for the iPad is extremely high, and they are not well thought out designs. The iPad is not a replacement for a laptop, but it is very convenient for travel. I like the big screen. Safari, an app, is clumsy to use. Google history is much more convenient. The History app gives you excellent TV programing.

I see no replacement in the next half year.at the soonest. So have returned both units to Amazon for refund.Another surprise when  two packages arrived not just the  one I thought  I had ordered. I am a computer  "Luddite"  So I may have screwed up. and ordered  second one from Amazon. I  returned  both machine on the same UPS bill also.  Both machines were  in "mint condition" when  picked up by our local UPS. When another project comes our way  we will purchase from Amazon. You  have met our expectations and given very good  Customer Service.Regrets, Norman H. Carter

I contact the Apple customer service many times but don't resolve the problem. I must buy another house with the address that match the info. I can use only for take pics and surfing internet...

Reviews.Title: Apple control is
Reviews.Author: Iamthatiam
Reviews.Content: .....Not right and to not have the ability to get social media off my computer is like being controlled by the "apple regime":I want to state upfront that the first computer I ever bought  was the apple II gs when apple first made computers and subsequently bought over 29+ computers with windows os due to business compatibility apps. I even set up 1 of laptops for dual os usage--- Linux and windows. I really loved Linux the bests but apps are hard to find. So,after nearly 35 yrs of computer usage,I feel I can objectively rate the apple iOS on my new ipad. I heard,read,and researched info. About apple and thought I should change over after conferring with my husband (senior software engineer) who said apple now has business apps for the professional population. That said: here I am after only one week of owning an iPad and I AM CONSIDERING getting rid of it, the main complaints about windows are: 1) windows 8 2) privacy, 3) the wga genuine harassment (paid a lot of money for msn windows 7 and EVEN with re-doing I'd numbers back and forth --- I constantly got a "not genuine" tag that constantly pops up no matter what I did--- I had been using the same os and upgraded to professional, and after a year, for some reason,it started popping up the WGA harassment!  4) during os scans,Microsoft data,,virus,identifying, LSO ,was the #1 culprit that were "infecting" my computer!  With these 4 windows os  ( there are FAR more) issues , I decided to leave that os. NOW The iPad issues : 1) apple support (for HOW to use this iPad--- not repairs or apps , all of which are general) I am being forced to give the serial number which I know to be a "record" of my personal computer. And NO I am NOT interested in a relationship with apple EVER. Don't I have the right to know how to use this expensive piece of ----- I hadn't even turned it on because I didn't want ios7 automatically downloading on my ipad! And the rep lied and said it wouldn't  and I have full control. Over it not happening. Well, it DID auto download without my permission! Even though it isn't installed, IT Is the manipulative,greedy, way that Apple is controlling over what I want to download . Now,I can't get rid of it,and this nagging update flag is in plain sight on my computer every time I turn it on, this control reeks of dictatorship without any regards to MYRight to use my computer! 2) I didn't buy this iPad for facebook or twitter or ANY social Media at all! Instead of going to the media website and installing it BY MY choice, it is everywhere ---- my settings, shows up in website address bar as I am typing which website I wANT to go to. And if my finger slips on it or I accidentally tap those sites, I get connected or it begins to install itself! This alone disgusts me no END! 3) all software downloads have to come through the apple store---how proprietorial is that! That , too, I didn't know. What I was told was that apple apps are virtually virus free without "bug". So why can't I download the free open office word processor directly from the Internet? Another  dictatorial control of apple. (4) the web browser is awful! No way of setting privacy features such as third party cookies (instead there is an "always" , "never" or when I visit,to always accept all cookies. A site by site "allowable cookie" option is not available. And I can't even get redirects stopped when I do a first party website connection,  No add ons, and I have to remember every time I leave the site or shut down, to have all browser history deleted and cookie deletion. Safari is the ONLY web browser because all other browsers have to go through apple's  exclusive browser and it slows down Internet service. (5) email is not user friendly. It is difficult to have all email sites linked to this feature. In fact, using emails other than gmail,yahoo is almost impossible. I don,t use them at all. (6) having to constantly use a password each and every time I access they apple stop is time consuming and the iPad doesn't allow me to have it automatically saved.Well there's the review.like I said ,i am considering getting rid of my ipad. In fact, I am trying to find a reason (s) to keep it. If I get rid of iPad--- I will use Linux only--- it is extremely popular in  Europe

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: GernanDawg
Reviews.Content: My family owns 3 iPads and a Mac computer and all of them are about was useful as a Tandy Computer from 1982. You can't do anything with an iPad but play games and if you intend to stay connected to the internet you had better get a graduate degree in software engineering because the average IT Tech can't keep any Apple devices connected to a wireless network. Mean while I have several PC desktops and laptops that NEVER have any connectivity issues. Our iPads are useless and Apple does not have any idea how to make them not useless....so now we have 3 $800 Kindles readers with apple logos on them that aren't as user friendly as the actual Kindles. I have no experience with any PC Type tablets but I have plenty with Apples and I won't waste any more on Apple products I assure you.

Reviews.Title: A Bad Apple Just Fell from the Apple Tree.........
Reviews.Author: LynnLuv59 "Nancy"
Reviews.Content: And landed right on ME! LOL!What wasn't really funny is the fact that I purchased the Newest, 4rth Generation IPad, the 64GBS Version, White, Standard-sized, with the Retina Display screen, and Siri onboard; and I guess, ready to "speak", but I won't ever know now, as I am having to return it, and fortunately for me, through a 2nd Party Buyer. Why is THAT a "Plus", in my favor? Because another large, corporate entity, that DOES stand behind their customers, will be behind me on the return of this Defective IPad, and literally, right out of the box! The Second Party ALSO, has deemed it "defective", formally, which will help.In short, I charged this brand new, IPad, for 12 hours straight, and it only went to 83% battery charge. after 14 hours of continuous chsrging, from TWO different charging stations, ( I also have an Ipod Touch, but that's for later. ) it only reached 95% charge, if NEVER reached a Full Charge, and this is on it's first one! No "lighting bolts" in battery, for me to see! I have since packed it up, and am awaiting the "call-tag ALREADY marked as "defective" from the Secondary Partner with Apple, and then I am sending it back ASAP! whether the trouble is the battery, or something technically more involved, I am NOT going to be the one left hanging with it THIS time!Three months ago, I bought my first Apple Product ever, and it was the IPod Touch, also in White, and also the 64GBS-version. It also was my first mp3 player, but I waited more than 3 years to finally decide to get it, as I have had problems with JUST how expensive Apple Products are, but if they work well, after all, "they" are the industry standard for the best there is. PLUS, they DO have their own network, IOS, which was very important to me, as well, At any rate, I got the IPod Touch, and it took 3 times, AND a Senior Technician, to get me on-line with the thing, and I told him THEN, that it shouldn't have been that difficult to get it to sync with my in-home wifi. It hadn't been with my other devices, including my workhorse computer. They are supposed to be such "user-friendly", people, with a Customer Service Center, and assistants, that are purported to be the best in the world. That is what I have been told, what is advertised the world over, and I have had some friends who have gotten Apple Products themselves, down through the years, and they have sworn by them, mostly. I FINALLY decided to make the leap, and get the Touch. It gave me NOTHING but problems, also right out of the box, and they just started with the problems with the initial set up. There were several others, and within the first two months of owning it, it went into Repair 4 times in turnaround shipping, they had it in their possession MORE than I did! On the fifth trouble call, and me madder than a wet hornet, I FINALLY got myself a Senior Advisor there, who took stock of the several complaints ALREADY lodged, and documented, mind you, and got me a Replacement IPod Touch, and........ It worked like a charm, also right out of the box, and it still is! The thing was, you see, it wasn't defective in the First Place! It has been working just fine, since I was issued it, and thank heaven's for that Senior Tech, as I am NOT sure that Apple Care wouldn't have left me hanging in mid-air, with the original IPod Touch, and I really think that they would have. I have come around a bit since THAT experience about not only Apple's Customer Service, but also concerning Apple's Quality Control Standards! What the heck is up, with that?After that fiasco, WHY was I willing to buy the New IPad? Because it was supposed to be a "second computer/backup" which it technically can be, btw, businessman even use them. It also is very portable, and also supposedly, easy to work with. Of course, I won't ever know that now, as I am having to return THIS one due to defectiveness right out of the box. It certainly HAS had an effect on me, I am waiting until AFTER the first of the year, either in January, or even February, before I make another move about getting something for my computing needs, and choices. I WON'T go through THIS mess again, I can tell you that! Besides, what were the odds that the same type of thing would happen to the same person, with TWO DIFFERENT APPLE PRODUCTS? I thought astronomical, that's WHY I took the chance on the purchase of the IPad.Which only goes to show, there are "Bad Apples's that DO Fall From the Apple Tree", and sometimes, lightning DOES strike in the same place! My question in all of this remains, Apple, wha?????????LynnLuv59
